Name: Tough as Nails
Effect: You rally.

Name: Highblood Teleport
Effect: Teleport up to 5.

Name: Lucky
Trigger: An attack hits you.
Effect: Reroll the attack roll and take the second result.

Name: True Grit
Trigger: You fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll
Effect: Add a +4 Ancestry bonus to the roll/throw.

Name: Breath Weapon
Hit:
1d6 + Constitution modifier. 
*Level 11:* 2d6 + Constitution modifier. 
*Level 21:* 3d6 + Constitution modifier.

Name: Disappearing Act
Trigger: You take damage.
Effect: Become invisible until the end of your next turn, or until you make an attack (whichever comes sooner).

Name: Ghost Sound
Effect: Ghost sound allows you to create a volume of sound that rises, recedes, approaches, or remains at a fixed place. You choose what type of sound ghost sound creates when casting it and cannot thereafter change the sound’s basic character. You can produce as much noise as a person. The noise a ghost sound spell produces can be virtually any type of sound within the volume limit.

Name: Half-Elven Ingenuity
Effect: Choose one: target shifts up to 2 as a free action, target makes a saving throw, target gets +2 power bonus to next attack roll or target gets +4 power bonus to next skill check. Power bonuses expire at the end of your next turn if not already used.

Name: Orcish Rush
Trigger: You hit with an attack.
Effect: Attack does +1dW. If attack was not with a weapon, +1d8 instead.

Name: Vengeance of the Pits
Trigger: An attack by that enemy hits you.
Effect:
The target takes 1d6 + Intelligence OR Charisma modifier fire damage. 
*Level 11:* 2d6 + Intelligence OR Charisma modifier. 
*Level 21:* 3d6 + Intelligence OR Charisma modifier.

Name: Barrel Along
Trigger: You are staggered.
Effect: You have a +2 bonus to speed and to damage rolls until the end of the encounter.

Name: Poisonous Nip
Flavor: Your fangs excrete a mild poison.
Hit:
1d8 + your Dexterity or Constitution modifier poison damage.
*Level 11:* Attack bonus increases to +4. 2d8 + modifier damage.
*Level 21:* Attack bonus increases to +6. 3d8 + modifier damage.

Name: Careful Focus
Trigger: You just made an attack roll.
Effect: Reroll the attack roll and take the new result.

Name: Farstrider
Effect: Shift up to your speed.

Name: One-Two Punch
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. If both attacks hit, the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Name: Fast Learner
Effect: Select a feat you meet the prerequisites for. You gain that feat until your next long rest.

Name: First Blood
Hit:
3dW + Strength modifier damage if the target is below maximum HP.
5dW + Strength modifier damage if the target is above maximum HP.

Name: Force Sphere
Effect: Create a sphere of force in a near burst between 1 and 5 squares in radius (your choice). The sphere is impenetrable by any means.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Just Desserts
Flavor: You show a foe that two can play at that game.
Trigger: The target imposes a condition or persistent damage on you or an ally.
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier and the target suffers the condition or persistent damage that they imposed.

Name: Out of Mind
Flavor: You slip out of view and appear somewhere totally different.
Effect: You teleport 20, but must choose a square that no other creature can see (you need not be able to see it). You are incorporeal and have phasing until the end of your next turn.

Name: Cloak Abduction
Flavor: You sweep someone up in your cloak.
Hit:
The creature is transported to an extradimensional space and cannot act (save ends). On a successful save, it appears in an unoccupied space adjacent to you. 
*Optional:* The creature takes 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage at the start of each turn it spends in the extradimensional space.
Miss: The creature is transported to the extradimensional space only till the end of your next turn, and it takes no damage.

Name: Dimensional Strike
Flavor: By shifting slightly between two worlds, you confuse the senses of your foe so you may land your attack more easily.
Hit:
1dW + Intelligence modifier damage. 
*Level 21:* 2dW + Intelligence modifier damage.

Name: Disturbing Blow
Flavor: By establishing counter-resonance within the spirit of an enemy with a well-placed blow, you may disrupt and disturb its next action.
Hit: 1dW + Intelligence modifier damage. The creature grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn or until it is next attacked, whichever occurs sooner.

Name: Cursed Fate
Flavor: You can befuddle and bewilder your opponent with this strike, causing a grave imbalance in the psyche of the victim.
Hit: 2dW + Intelligence modifier damage and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Miss: 1dW + Intelligence modifier damage and the creature grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn or until it is next attacked, whichever occurs sooner.

Name: Ghost Hunting Blow
Flavor: By reaching across the barrier between worlds, you may strike at disembodied spirits as easily you would strike a normal mortal.
Effect: Your attacks do force damage as well as any other type of damage, and they do damage against incorporeal targets as if the targets were not incorporeal.

Name: Inner Sense
Flavor: By sensing ripples in the spiritual world around him, you are capable of better avoiding dangerous effects and situations.
Trigger: You make a saving throw.
Effect: Add +2 to the result.
Special: You can use this power after seeing the result of your roll.

Name: Spirit Sensing Stance
Flavor: By sensing the different patterns all beings that exist have, your senses exceed that of natural beings and move into the realm of supernatural awareness.
Effect: You know the location to the nearest square of all creatures within 6 squares of you, even if they are hiding, incorporeal or invisible.

Name: Leaping Spirit Dance
Flavor: Light as a feather, you move gracefully in combat, with the smooth and practiced grace of an incorporeal being.
Effect: You receive a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex. If you end any turn without having moved at least 2 squares, this stance ends.

Name: Resonance Strike
Flavor: By funneling your spiritual power into your attack, you may strike an opponent with glowing silvery light.
Hit: 3dW + Intelligence modifier force damage

Name: Fading Strike
Flavor: You learn the basic technique for walking between worlds to reach locations that previously could be inaccessible on the mortal world and potentially attack foes at those locales.
Effect: Teleport 6

Name: Half-Gone
Flavor: By momentarily slipping through the barrier between the Material and the Astral planes, you may attempt to avoid an attack by being incorporeal.
Trigger: You are hit by an attack.
Effect: You are incorporeal for the purpose of this attack (typically, you take half damage from the attack).

Name: Altered Penumbra
Flavor: Position is relative to your thinking, and your position in the universe is mutable. Using these principles, you may circumvent reality to remove yourself from harm's way when necessary.
Trigger: You are the target of an attack.
Effect: Teleport 2. In your space is conjured an immovable illusion of yourself. The conjuration disappears once it is hit by a Melee or Ranged attack (potentially including the attack that triggered the use of this power).
Special: If the teleportation does not move you outside the range of a Near or Far attack, you are still subject to that attack.
Maintain: Move

Name: Brilliant Moon
Flavor: By partially phasing a portion of your attack out of this reality, you may ignore certain obstacles, such as armor, when striking at an opponent.
Hit: 2dW + Intelligence modifier force damage.

Name: Breath of the Moon
Flavor: You use the principles of lunar cycles on the psyche of mortals.
Hit: 2dW + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target cannot target you with attacks (save ends).
Miss: Target cannot target you with attacks until the end of your next turn.

Name: Formless Dance
Flavor: You immerse yourself in a sort of dimensional flux, causing you to be able to see what cannot be perceived and seemingly be in many places at once.
Effect: You have concealment and truesight 6.

Name: Ghostwalk
Flavor: You step through to the borderland between the Material and the Ethereal planes, becoming an incorporeal figure in both realities for a few moments.
Hit: You become incorporeal until the end of your next turn.

Name: Ethereal Reminiscence
Flavor: The ectoplasmic nature of beings on the Ethereal plane allows you to briefly transport yourself to that realm and use your will to restore some of your form by filling your wounds with spectral energies, displacing your injuries.
Hit: You become incorporeal until the end of your next turn. Spend a recovery and heal your recovery value.

Name: Fading Leap
Flavor: With nary a thought and a gesture you may flow like moonlight from one location to another through the Astral plane, moving faster than your earthly body would allow.
Effect: Teleport 6

Name: Flicker Strike
Flavor: In a flickering blur of teleportation and movement, you disappear, blink into existence to strike a foe, and then disappear again to appear a safe distance away.
Effect:
Teleport 6.
*Secondary Attack:* Intelligence vs AC. 2dW + Intelligence modifier damage on a hit, and you can teleport 6.

Name: Essence Shattering Strike
Flavor: With a powerful strike, you attack the very spirit of his foe with your silver-blue light.
Hit: 3dW + Intelligence modifier damage and the target is dazed (save ends).

Name: Stance of the Ether Gate
Flavor: By shifting your essence partially into the Astral plane, you find that moving through that plane as just as easy as moving through the material plane.
Effect: As a move action, you can teleport 6.

Name: Twisting Ether
Flavor: With a nod to your ally, you sink through the world with your ally and switch places for better effect in combat.
Effect: You and your ally simultaneously swap spaces via teleportation.

Name: Warp Worm
Flavor: By creating temporary breaches between the worlds of the Material and the Astral, you may teleport through a few enemies and emerge from the space between worlds having done your foes great internal harm.
Hit: 3dW + Intelligence modifier damage, and teleport 4.
Effect:
*Secondary Attack:* Intelligence vs AC. 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and teleport 4 on a hit (no damage, teleport 2 on miss). 
*Secondary Attack:* Intelligence vs AC. 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and teleport 4 on a hit (no damage, teleport 2 on miss).
Each secondary attack must be against a different target to the other secondary attack, and to the primary attack.

Name: Ether Wave
Flavor: You concentrate your spiritual energies to your hand, tear into the barrier between the Astral and the Material, and release the energies that form from this in a wracking wave of silvery-blue energy.
Hit: 3dW + Intelligence modifier force damage, and persistent 5 force damage (save ends).

Name: Phantom Penumbra
Flavor: To slip through the worlds is a simple matter for you, and using this to deceive and evade an attacker is effortlessly done.
Effect: A number of times equal to the number of recoveries you have spent so far since your last long rest, you can force enemies within 6 to reroll an attack roll. You can only force each attack roll to be rerolled once.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Spiritual Weapon Stance
Flavor: By channeling ethereal energies along your weapons and his body, you become immersed in both worlds, being as solid on the Ethereal Plane as you are on the Material.
Effect: Your attacks do persistent 5 force damage (save ends).

Name: Fade Through
Flavor: You fold two points in space around you to appear at another location within the span of a heart beat.
Effect: Move up to your speed, with phasing. Make a basic melee attack against each enemy that you move through.

Name: Anchoring Spirit
Flavor: You pull yourself fully into the Ethereal and manifests a ghostly apparition of your form upon the Material, and in doing so you lock your immediate area for travel through the Ethereal or Astral plane.
Effect: You become incorporeal. Enemies within 12 cannot choose to teleport. Allies within 12 can always choose not to teleport if they would be subject to an effect that would teleport them.

Name: Lunar Penumbra
Flavor: It is said that the moon is portrayed in some legends as a laughing trickster, and with this powerful ability, you pull an incredible trick upon your foe.
Trigger: You are the target of an attack.
Effect: You and the attacker swap places via teleportation. The attacker now becomes the target of their own attack.

Name: Dispersal Strike
Flavor: With a powerful strike and flash of silver-blue light, you slam your foe directly into the Ethereal for a few moments, causing it to become ghostly and unreal.
Hit: 4dW + Intelligence modifier damage.
Effect: The target becomes incorporeal (save ends). While incorporeal, their attacks behave as if all targets had the incorporeal property (in most cases, this means they do half damage).

Name: Flashing Ether Touch
Flavor: With but a touch you send a foe hurtling through the Astral to reappear with frightening velocity to hit the ground.
Hit: The target disappears until the beginning of your next turn. Then they appear in the space 12 squares above the space that they disappeared from.
Effect: The target appears in the space 6 squares above the space that they disappeared from.

Name: Eclipsing Moon
Flavor: Folding space around your form effortlessly, you leap through the ether and attack through the barrier between the worlds in a series of staccato bursts of silvery-blue light, your image blinking as you strike.
Hit: 2dW + Intelligence modifier damage.
Effect: After all attacks had been made, choose a space adjacent to an enemy within range. You teleport to that space.

Name: Banish to the Beyond
Flavor: You lay a mark against a target and shunt it gently into the Astral plane where it may ponder its reasons for crossing the likes of a master.
Hit: 4dW + Intelligence modifier force damage. If the target's current hit points are lower than yours, they are transported to the Astral Plane indefinitely. Otherwise, they are transported to the Astral Plane (save ends).

Name: Mageblade's Sigil
Effect: The target is marked until you use this power again.

Name: Beacon Sigil
Trigger: A creature marked by your *sigil* makes an attack that does not include you as a target
Effect: Teleport to an unoccupied square adjacent to the target and make a basic melee attack against them.

Name: Blurring Sigil
Trigger: A creature marked by your *sigil* makes an attack that does not include you as a target
Effect: Any one target of the triggering creature's attack gains resistance to all damage equal to your level + your Constitution modifier, until the end of the current turn.

Name: Fiery Sigil
Trigger: A creature marked by your *sigil* makes an attack that does not include you as a target
Effect: The triggering creature takes 1d6 + your Charisma modifier fire damage. *Level 11:* 2d6 + your Charisma modifier damage. *Level 21:* 3d6 + your Charisma modifier damage.

Name: Vortex Sigil
Trigger: A creature marked by your *sigil* attempts to make an attack that does not include you as a target
Effect: The triggering creature teleports to an unoccupied square adjacent to you. If it now arranges the attack so that it includes you as a target, the attack goes ahead. Otherwise it misses all targets.

Name: Spark Strike
Flavor: By letting the power of the elements flow through you and into your attack, you’re able to strike true with raw primal energies at your unlucky foe.
Hit: 2dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage.

Name: Variable Flux
Flavor: Filling your weapon with the power of the elements, you lash out with barely-contained eldritch power.
Hit:
1dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage, and the target is subject to one of the following until the end of your next turn.
* Lightning: -2 penalty on Ranged attack rolls.
* Acid: Slowed.
* Fire: Persistent fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
* Cold: Vulnerability to lightning and cold 5.
* Thunder: Dazed.

Name: Energy Jolt
Flavor: You fill the opponent with harmful elemental energy, dealing damage and causing them to suffer debilitating effects.
Hit:
1dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage, and the target:
* Air: Is pulled 2.
* Acid: Takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
* Fire: Loses their next move action.
* Cold: Is shunted 1.
* Thunder: Is pushed 2.

Name: Eldritch Shield
Flavor: By drawing upon the elements, you are capable of defending against energy effects.
Trigger: You are about to take damage.
Effect: You gain resistance to [flux] 5 + your Constitution modifier, for that attack.

Name: Elemental Nimbus
Flavor: Channeling the strength of the elements lends your attacks strength and fury.
Effect: Each attack that hits does +1d6 [flux] damage. You can choose to daze a target that you hit until the end of your next turn, but then this power ends.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Elemental Realignment
Effect: Change your Flux energy. You gain resistance to [flux] 5 + your Constitution modifier until the end of the encounter.

Name: Fluctuation Movement
Flavor: Coating your feet in the power of the elements, you alter your movement to grant you a burst of speed and maneuverability.
Effect:
You get a benefit based on your [flux]:
* Lightning: Make a jump as a free action, with a +10 bonus to Athletics.
* Acid: Ignore difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.
* Fire: Your speed increases by +2 until the end of your next turn.
* Cold: Until the end of your next turn, when you charge you can move however you like (not just in a straight line).
* Thunder: Until the end of your next turn, whenever you are subject to unwilling movement you can shift 1 at the end of the move.

Name: Arcane Shield
Flavor: You rely on your unique insight into eldritch powers to create a shield of energy that protects you from an attack.
Trigger: You are hit by an attack.
Effect: Attacker rerolls their attack.

Name: Degrade Resistance
Flavor: As a disciple of the Elemental Flux, you understand how to use elements to assault those normally resistant to them.
Effect: Your attacks ignore the first 5 points of energy resistance.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Eldritch Fang
Flavor: You fill your strike with eldritch energy that overwhelms the senses of your target.
Hit: 2dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Elemental Strike
Flavor: You channel the fluctuating power of the elements to land an empowered blow.
Hit:
2dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage, and the target is subject to one of the following based on your flux energy.
* Acid: Weakened (end of your next turn).
* Thunder: Immobile (end of your next turn).
* Fire: Blinded (end of your next turn).
* Cold: Knocked prone.
* Lightning: Dazed (end of your next turn).

Name: Energy Spark
Flavor: You fill the air with elemental energy, which explodes as you strike your target.
Hit: 3dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage

Name: Elemental Flux Stance
Flavor: Filling both your body and soul with the power of the elements, you open yourself up to new powers.
Effect:
Yourself and allies within range get one based on your [flux], until the end of your next turn:
* Lightning: +2 bonus to speed.
* Acid: Ignore the first 1 square of unwilling movement.
* Fire: Heal an additional +1d6 damage each time they would heal.
* Cold: Take a +2 bonus on all saving throws.
* Thunder: One hit on an attack per turn pushes 1.

Name: Lance of Power
Flavor: With a swing of your blade, you release a rippling line of elemental energy.
Hit:
1dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage and one option based on your flux energy:
* Thunder: Targets are deafened (save ends).
* Lightning: Targets must save or drop what they are holding.
* Fire: Take an additional 1d8 damage.
* Cold: Targets must save or fall prone.
* Acid: Targets are slowed.

Name: Raging Flux
Flavor: You know how to strike with such eldritch force that it drives your foes backwards.
Hit: 3dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage.
Effect: Creates a zone in the area of effect, until the end of the encounter. Creatures that enter the zone take 1d6 + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage. At the beginning of each of your turns, creatures in the zone take 1d6 + your Intelligence modifier [flux] damage. While the zone persists, you can change your flux energy once each turn a creature is damaged by your *raging flux*.

Name: Assay Resistance
Flavor: By directly targeting the elemental essence that suffuses all creatures, you overcome an opponent’s defenses with a powerful attack.
Effect: You learn the target's resistances, immunities and vulnerabilities. Until the end of your next turn, the target becomes vulnerable to [flux] 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Boost: **Level 22:** Targets all creatures in area of effect. Vulnerable 10.

Name: Arcane Torrent
Flavor: You unleash a sudden burst of eldritch energy that surges towards a distant foe.
Hit: 2dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage and push 3.

Name: Energy Hammer
Flavor: As you advance your training, you learn to unleash ever more powerful bursts of energy.
Hit:
2dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage and one of the following based on your [flux]: 
* Thunder: Target is deafened and dazed (save ends both).
* Acid: Target takes 5 persistent acid damage (save ends).
* Fire: Target is blinded (save ends). 
* Cold: Target is immobile (save ends).
* Lightning: Target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Name: Eldritch Consumption
Flavor: You have such an intimate understanding of the underlying nature of magic that you can capture its essence and feast on it to rejuvenate yourself.
Trigger: You take damage from an energy source.
Effect: Spend a recovery to heal your recovery value + your Constitution modifier. You may change your flux energy if you like.

Name: Chaotic Blow
Hit: 3dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage.

Name: Elemental Drive
Flavor: You charge your weapon with kinetic and elemental energy, driving them back with a wave of elemental power.
Trigger: You make an attack after a charge.
Effect: Whether or not you hit, you do an additional 2dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage and push them squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

Name: Elemental Absorption
Flavor: You learn to suffuse your being with an element to such a degree that its presence heals you instead of harming you.
Trigger: You are about to take energy damage.
Effect: Set your flux energy to the energy of your choice. Until the end of the encounter, you are immune to [flux] damage, and heal your level + your Constitution modifier each time you are subject to [flux] damage.

Name: Nexus of Elemental Retribution
Flavor: You can absorb and redirect the flow of elemental power, syphoning away energies that would harm you and making them your own.
Hit: You gain resistance 15 to fire, acid, cold, lightning and thunder. Each time you are the target of an attack that does fire, acid, cold, lightning or thunder damage, you can make a basic melee or ranged attack that does additional [flux] damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Name: Redirecting Flux
Flavor: Your mastery of the Elemental Flux discipline knows how to read and alter the flow of magical energy.
Trigger: A creature uses a Near or Far power that targets you and/or an ally.
Effect: Choose a number of creatures within the area of effect up to your Constitution modifier. Those creatures are no longer targets of the attack. Choose a number of enemies within Near burst 10. Those creatures are targets of the attack, even if they are not within the area of effect.

Name: Enter the Vortex
Flavor: Riding on the currents of elemental energy, you gain the benefit of a new form of movement.
Hit:
2dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage, and you get a benefit until the end of the encounter based on your [flux]:
* Fire: Your speed increases by 4, and you get a +4 power bonus to initiative.
* Cold: You get a swim speed of 12. Any time you are subject to unwilling movement, you can instead shift that distance. 
* Thunder: You get a fly speed of 8.
* Lightning: You can teleport 4 as a move action. 
* Acid: You get a burrow speed of 4 and tremorsense 6.

Name: Elemental Vortex
Flavor: A whirling vortex of elemental energy engulfs your foe just as your blade lands.
Hit: 3dW + Intelligence modifier damage.
Effect: You conjure a vortex devil in an adjacent square, which lasts till the end of the encounter. You can shunt the vortex devil up to 6 as a swift action, once per turn. At the end of your turn, enemies adjacent to the vortex demon take 3d10 [flux] damage.

Name: Cascade of Elemental Wrath
Flavor: Each slash of your blade releases more and more eldritch power, overwhelming your enemies with the power of your strikes.
Hit: Three attacks. 2dW + Intelligence modifier damage. You can change your flux energy before each attack.

Name: Zephyr Flux
Flavor: Upon reaching supreme levels of understanding in this discipline, you may transmute your entire being into elemental energy and travel in the blink of an eye across the battlefield, leaving a wake of devastation behind you.
Hit: 2dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage.
Special: When you use this power, shift up to your speed. Make the attack against any creature you are adjacent to at some point during your shift.

Name: Eldritch Energy Hammer
Flavor: You know how to destroy the bonds that hold magic together just as easily as you can forge them.
Range Details: weapon, one zone, summon or conjuration in range
Hit:
The conjuration or zone is destroyed, or the summon takes 5dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage. Enemies within the zone, or enemies within Near burst 3 of the summon (if destroyed) or conjuration are subject to a secondary attack.
*Secondary Attack:* Intelligence vs Will; 3dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage.

Name: Elemental Destruction Ring
Flavor: You whip the elements around you into a fury, then unleash the energy at all the foes who surround you.
Hit: 4dW + Intelligence modifier [flux] damage.
Effect:
Create a zone in Near burst 1 to you, which remains around you as you move. At the end of your turn, enemies within the zone experience an effect based on your flux: 
* Lightning: Saving throw or blinded until the end of your next turn.
* Acid: -2 penalty to attack rolls and 10 acid damage. 
* Thunder: Knocked prone, no save.
* Cold: Slowed until the end of your next turn.
* Fire: Dazed until the end of your next turn.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Strike of Elemental Devestation
Flavor: The ultimate expression of elemental power can only be unleashed by a master of the Elemental Flux discipline, and by calling upon the arcane forces of magic as well as the terrific power of the elements, the disciple may crush his opponents under a fierce magical assault.
Hit: 7dW + Intelligence modifier damage.
Effect: All enemies within a number of squares of the target equal to your Constitution modifier gain vulnerability to [flux] 15.

Name: Censure Undead
Flavor: You present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring the undead.
Hit:
1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. Target is pushed 3 + your Charisma modifier and immobile until the end of your next turn.
*Level 5:* 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage; *Level 11:* 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage; *Level 15:* 4d8 + Wisdom modifier damage; *Level 21:* 5d8 + Wisdom modifier damage; *Level 25:* 6d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Miss: Half damage. Target is pushed squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Name: Guidance
Effect: +1 bonus to your next attack roll or saving throw. If you do not use this bonus by the end of your next turn, you lose it.

Name: Spur On
Trigger: The target is making an attack roll or saving throw.
Effect: The target takes 1d10 psychic damage, but can reroll the roll once if it misses/fails.

Name: Infuse with Life
Range Details: burst 5 (Level 11: 10; Level 21: 15), self or one ally
Effect:
Target spends a recovery and heals their recovery value +1d6.
*Level 6:* 2d6; *Level 11:* 3d6; *Level 16:* 4d6; *Level 21:* 5d6; *Level 26:* 6d6.

Name: Light Ward
Effect: The target receives a +2 bonus to all defences until the end of your next turn. The first time it is hit by an attack during this period, the attacker takes your Wisdom modifier in damage.

Name: Shielded Soul
Trigger: The target takes damage.
Effect: The target gets resistance to all damage 5. *Level 11:* 10. *Level 21:* 15.

Name: Identify Target
Hit: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn. The first ally to hit the target with an attack heals 1d6 + your Charisma modifier HP.

Name: Targeted Call
Effect: Choose one ally. They make a basic melee or ranged attack. In addition, until the end of the encounter, each time they hit with an attack they gain temporary HP equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Name: Break Will
Hit: The target is weakened (save ends).

Name: Rescuing Angel
Trigger: An ally in range is reduced to 0 HP or below
Effect: Choose one ally. They make a basic melee or ranged attack against the creature that made the attack, and can add your Charisma modifier to their attack and damage. You move your speed. If you end your move adjacent to the original ally, they can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value plus your Wisdom modifier.

Name: Teaspoon of Cement
Trigger: An ally in range is hit by an attack.
Effect: The ally can spend a recovery to gain temporary hit points equal to their recovery value.

Name: Encouraging Peal
Flavor: You let out shouts of encouragement to bolster your allies in battle.
Effect: Targets receive a +2 power bonus on attack rolls and add your Charisma modifier to damage until the end of the encounter.

Name: The Strength Within
Effect: The target can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value, and add your Charisma modifier to damage rolls until the end of your next turn.

Name: Pride Leader's Stance
Flavor: By adopting the mannerisms of commanding lions of the great savannahs, you inspire heroics by your presence.
Effect: Allies within 10 (including yourself) have a +2 power bonus to Will defence and on saving throws.

Name: Call to Action
Flavor: By having a watchful eye on the flow of combat, you know when to spur an ally into a better position.
Effect: Choose two allies. Each ally chooses one: they may Charge the target, or make a basic melee or ranged attack against them.

Name: Rallying Instruction
Effect: The target can make a basic melee or ranged attack. They also regain one recovery.

Name: Golden Commander Stance
Flavor: Through the use of your superior tactical ability, you are able to direct your allies in combat for maximum effectiveness.
Effect: Any enemies within 10 that are flanked by any allies (including yourself) count as flanked by all of your allies. For example, if A and B are flanking a goblin, ally C can attack that goblin and get the benefits of flanking, even if they make a ranged attack.

Name: Inherit Toughness
Flavor: With a cry to defend themselves from incoming attacks, your inspirational words aid your allies in their defense.
Effect: Each target heals 10 + your Charisma modifier HP.

Name: Milestone Foe
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, attacks against the target add your Charisma modifier to the attack and damage roll. If the enemy is reduced to 0 HP or below in that time, all allies within range can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value plus your Wisdom modifier.

Name: Identify Weak Point
Hit: The target is vulnerable to all damage 5 until the end of the encounter.
Effect: The target is dazed (save ends).

Name: Golden General's Victory
Flavor: You are a beacon of command on the field of battle, inspiring your troops by your mere presence.
Effect: Each target can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value. They also make a saving throw against one effect of their choice. They get a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Name: Restraint
Effect: The target cannot make attacks (save ends).

Name: To Arms
Effect: Each ally gets a free action to do one: charge, make a basic melee or ranged attack or spend a recovery to heal their recovery value.

Name: Discipline of the Pride
Flavor: Through training with your allies, you have taught them the basics of your military skill that they may call upon in times of duress.
Trigger: Use when you have just used a utility power with the range of Self.
Effect: The utility power you just used as a range of "Self and one ally within range of *discipline of the pride*

Name: Martyr
Trigger: You are hit by an attack
Effect: An ally within range can make a basic melee or ranged attack or charge against the creature that made the attack. The attack has combat advantage, and adds your Wisdom modifier to attack and damage rolls.

Name: Blitzing Yell
Hit: The target is stunned (save ends).
Effect: Allies within range can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value plus your Wisdom modifier.

Name: Lion's Feast
Flavor: As the thrill of a successful hunt invigorates a pride of lions on the plains, so does the thrill of victory over foes invigorate your allies.
Effect: Whenever an enemy within 10 is reduced to 0 HP or below, choose an ally within 10. That ally can spend a recovery and heal their recovery value plus your Charisma modifier.

Name: Alpha's Roar
Flavor: With an awesome cry for victory and bravery from your allies, you bolster allies’ defenses and attacks for a moment as your allies cannot help themselves but to win.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, any ally that misses with an encounter or daily attack power can choose to keep the power unexpended instead of its usual miss effect (if any).

Name: Take Me
Hit: The target is stunned (save ends) and marked.

Name: Full Suite
Effect: One ally regains all expended encounter powers. You regain one expended encounter power.

Name: Gripped with Fear
Hit: Shunt the target squares equal to your Charisma modifier. Each ally in range selects a target. If the target passes within reach, they may make an opportunity attack against that creature during the shunt.

Name: Remember Me?
Trigger: An ally has just finished an action.
Effect: The target can repeat the last action it performed again, even if it used an expended power.

Name: Pack Pounce
Flavor: By capitalizing on the opportunities granted by the presence of your allies who are attacking your foe, your lethality increases dramatically due to your knowledge of pack tactics.
Hit:
1dW + Strength modifier damage, +2 for every ally that is adjacent to the target.
Level 21: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, +4 for every ally that is adjacent to the target.

Name: Demoralizing Roar
Flavor: With a shout of rage and defiance, you wade into battle with fearless determination, shattering the resolve of your foes.
Hit: Target is dazed (save ends)
Miss: Target is dazed until the end of your next turn

Name: Tactical Strike
Flavor: Any commander knows that in battle, footwork is key. By utilizing this theory, you help your comrades to understand this.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage. Choose an ally within 2. They can shift 2.

Name: Hunting Party
Flavor: When two or more soldiers converge on a single target, the odds of victory increase and with the knowledge of this strike you can assist your comrade’s potential lethality.
Trigger: An ally hits an enemy
Effect: Another ally within range of the enemy (including yourself) makes a basic attack (melee or ranged) against the enemy.

Name: Pride Movement
Flavor: By having a watchful eye on the flow of combat, you know when to spur an ally into a better position.
Effect: The target can take a move action right away,

Name: Distracting Strike
Flavor: By attracting the attentions of a foe with a well-placed and vicious blow, you may distract and weaken your foe to the predations of your allies.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Name: Defending the Pride
Flavor: With a cry to defend themselves from incoming attacks, the inspirational words of the disciple aid your allies in your defense.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Allies within 5 receive a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.

Name: Warning Roar
Flavor: Witnessing a clear and present danger to an ally, you shout out a well-timed warning and aid your ally in defending against an attack.
Trigger: An ally in range is hit by an attack.
Effect: The attacker must reroll their attack and use the second result.

Name: Circling the Prey
Flavor: With practiced precision and a quick shout, you and your allies move in unison for better strategic advantage.
Effect: You and all allies in range shift 1.

Name: Pyrite Swipe
Flavor: With a powerful strike, you push your foe into the waiting arms of your allies and their hungry blades.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage and push the target 2. Each ally that is in reach of the target at some point during its move may make a melee basic attack against it.
Boost:
**Level 17:** 2dW + Strength modifier damage and shunt the target 4
**Level 27:** 3dW + Strength modifier damage and shunt the target 8

Name: Kill the Wounded
Flavor: You make a ferocious assault on your foe, opening the enemy’s defenses to the attacks of your allies.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: The target gets vulnerability to all damage 5 until the end of your next turn.

Name: Direct the Pride
Flavor: Cooperation and teamwork form the backbone of tactical warfare, and through your knowledge of all of these things, you may help direct the actions of your ally to greater effectiveness.
Range Details: burst 5, one ally that has not yet acted this turn
Effect: The ally moves up in the inititative order to act just after your turn ends.

Name: Golden Lion Charger
Flavor: A student of the art of war, you know that sometimes a powerful opening charge can be the edge the warrior needs.
Effect: Allies in range, including yourself, add your Charisma modifier to damage when attacking during the Charge action.

Name: Charge of the Battle Cat
Flavor: Like the charge of the mighty lion as he takes his prey to the ground, you charge into battle, heedless of your enemies, to crash into your chosen foe with a mighty strike, knocking them to the ground at your feet.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and the target falls prone.
Special: Before your attack, move up to your speed.

Name: Golden Swipe
Flavor: With a series of furious blows against your foe, you batter his opponent into the waiting blades of your allies.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: push the target 6. Each ally that is in reach of the target at some point during its move may make a melee basic attack against it.

Name: Harry the Prey
Flavor: Through coordinated tactics, the comrades at your side may act as one.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Allies within 5 squares of the target can make a basic melee attack against a target of their choice, or a basic ranged attack against the target of your attack.

Name: Guard the Pride
Flavor: You trust in your heavenly sense of the battle around you to see where the next attack is coming and move away from danger.
Effect: You and all allies receive a +10 power bonus to attack rolls. Each time an attack misses one of you, the bonus decreases by 2 until it reaches +0, at which point this power ends.

Name: Roar of Battle
Flavor: You deliver a telling blow, shattering bones and piercing defenses alike as you press the foe into opening vital places for your allies to gain purchase.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and the target gets vulnerability to all damage 5 until the end of your next turn.

Name: Strategic Blow
Flavor: With a tremendous strike, you confuse the enemy and create an opening for an ally to reposition themselves.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Allies within 5 of the target can immediately shift 2 as a free action.

Name: Golden General's Stance
Flavor: A beacon of victory upon the field of combat, you personify glory in combat and those in your presence may share in your prowess.
Effect: Allies within 5 receive a +2 power bonus on attack rolls. If they score a critical hit, they add your Charisma modifier to the damage.

Name: Lord of the Pridelands
Flavor: Proving you are the undisputed master of war, you call for absolute and crushing victory through overwhelming force of numbers.
Effect: Allies within 10 can use your Strength attack bonus instead of their own for any melee attacks that they make.

Name: War Lion's Charge
Flavor: With the ferocity of an angered lion, you race across the battlefield ignoring secondary targets to bear down on a single enemy and reduce them to dust.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn
Effect: Half damage and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Lion Lord's Agony
Flavor: With a fury born of desperation and determination for victory, you pour your pain into your swings so that the enemy may drink deeply of it.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage and push the target 2.

Name: Triumphant Lion's Leadership
Flavor: The power and majesty of the lion lords of the wild lives within you, so much so that your victories are a victory for all of his allies.
Trigger: Your ally is the target of an attack
Hit: 7dW + Strength modifier damage, and the attack that triggered this power misses.
Miss: Half damage. If the triggering attack hits, it does half damage.
Effect: The ally in question can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value.
Special: Before your attack, shift up to twice your speed.

Name: Companion Strike
Hit: Your companion makes a basic melee attack and adds your Charisma modifier to the damage.

Name: Side by Side
Hit: 1dW + Charisma modifier damage.
Effect: Your companion can also move its speed and make a basic melee attack against the same target.

Name: Share Senses
Effect: You can use any or all of your companion's senses as your own, gaining the benefits of any special senses that it has. During this time, you lose any of the senses that you take from your companion. For example, you could share your companion's sight, but keep your hearing.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Lifelink
Trigger: Your companion is hit by an attack.
Effect: You experience all of the consequences of the attack hit, instead of your companion. If you are also a target of the attack, you experience the attack twice.

Name: Leaping Intercept
Trigger: Your companion is adjacent to you and you are hit by an attack
Effect: You take half damage from the attack and your familiar takes half damage from the attack.

Name: Familiar Guidance
Trigger: You miss on an at-will or encounter attack
Effect: Reroll the attack and take the second result.

Name: Leap to Companion
Effect: Teleport to the space occupied by your companion. If they are a familiar, they are hidden away. If they are a different type of companion, they shift 1 into an unoccupied space.

Name: Safeguard Companion
Trigger: Your companion is the target of an attack from an enemy adjacent to it.
Hit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier + Intelligence modifier and push the target 2.

Name: Call Back Familiar
Trigger: Your familiar is hit by an attack.
Effect: Your familiar teleports to your space and is hidden away.

Name: Interfering Companion
Effect: Your companion can flank, if it couldn't already.
Boost:
*Level 10:* You get combat advantage against enemies adjacent to your companion.
*Level 20:* Enemies adjacent to your companion cannot shift. You get combat advantage against enemies adjacent to your companion.

Name: Companion Form
Effect: You take the form of your companion, including size, source and type, senses and speed. As a swift action, you can resume your true form until you spend another swift action.
Maintain: Standard

Name: Master's Form
Effect: Your companion transforms into a humanoid of your race with the same age, gender, and build of its true form, though it always maintains a clearly unnatural remnant of its nature, such as a cat's eyes or a serpent's tongue.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Companion Swarm
Range Details: burst 1, range 20 (must be your companion's space)
Hit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier damage
Effect: Creates a zone. *Swarm Zone:* Enemies that enter the zone or begin their turn in it take 10 damage and are slowed until the start of their next turn. Spend a move action to move the zone up to 2.
Special: Your companion is removed from play while the zone remains in effect.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Enlarge Companion
Effect: If your companion is smaller than Medium size, it grows to Medium size. If your companion is Medium size or larger, it increases by one size category. Its maximum HP are set to your staggered value. The companion can flank. Once per round, the companion can knock an adjacent enemy prone or push it 1.

Name: Mindblade Conjuration
Effect:
You create a weapon of the type of your choice. The weapon is enchanted; at 1st-level it is a +1 magic weapon.
*Level 6:* +2 magic weapon.
*Level 11:* +3 magic weapon.
*Level 16:* +4 magic weapon.
*Level 21:* +5 magic weapon.
*Level 26:* +6 magic weapon.

Name: Evasive Strike
Hit:
1dW + Dexterity modifier damage and you shift 1.
*Level 21:* 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Deadly Thrust
Hit:
1dW + Dexterity modifier. If the target is staggered, also add your Strength modifier to the damage. 
*Level 21:* 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Flying Blade
Hit:
1dW + Dexterity modifier and you gain momentum.
*Level 21:* 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Retort
Trigger: You lose momentum
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier.
Effect:
Make a secondary attack against the same target. 
*Secondary Attack:* Dexterity vs AC; 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage *or* 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage if you gained momentum this turn.

Name: Sure Cut
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier.
Miss: If you have momentum, you lose momentum but the target takes damage equal to your Triumphant Strike value.

Name: Roll With It
Trigger: You are hit by an attack while you have momentum.
Effect: You take half damage from the attack and do not lose momentum.

Name: Pocket of Sand
Hit: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Special: If you have momentum and an enemy targets you with an attack, you can lose momentum to use this as an immediate (react) action against that enemy.

Name: Tumbling Strike
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, if an attack misses you you can shift 1 as an immediate (react) action.

Name: Attack from the Blue
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Special: Move up to your speed before your attack. If you moved less than your speed before the attack, you can shift a number of squares up to the difference after your attack.

Name: Double Down
Trigger: You make an attack roll or skill check.
Effect: Reroll the attack roll or check. If the attack still misses or the check still fails, you are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Sloppy Strike
Hit:
1dW + Dexterity modifier damage. The first time the target attacks you, you can make a secondary attack against them as an immediate (counter) action. If they do not attack you before the start of your next turn, the effect ends. 
*Secondary Attack:* Dexterity vs AC; 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage and the target is slowed.
Boost: *Level 17:* If your secondary attack hits, the triggering attack automatically misses.

Name: Bleeding Strike
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage and the target takes persistent 5 damage and is slowed (both ongoing).

Name: Kip-Up
Effect: You stand up from prone.

Name: Deflection
Trigger: You are missed by a Melee or Ranged attack while you have momentum.
Effect: Choose an enemy in range of the missed attack. The attacker makes the attack that missed you against that target.

Name: Slick Feint
Hit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Effect:
Make a secondary attack against a different target.
*Secondary Attack:* Dexterity vs AC; 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Thief's Strike
Trigger: You hit a target within reach.
Effect: You can make a Sleight of Hand check against that enemy, for example to plant something on them or to pick their pocket.

Name: Assassin's Gambit
Hit:
3dW + Dexterity damage. If the target is reduced to 0 HP or below, you can shift 2 and make a secondary attack.
*Secondary Attack:* Dexterity vs AC; 3dW + Dexterity damage.

Name: Spikey Bastard
Trigger: An enemy misses you with an attack.
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity damage.
Effect: While you maintain this power, each time an enemy misses you with an attack you can make a basic melee attack against them as an immediate (react) action.
Maintain: Swift

Name: True Targeting
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you ignore all cover and concealment penalties, and can see invisible creatures and things.

Name: I'll Take It
Trigger: You roll a natural 19 on an attack.
Effect: The attack counts as a critical hit.

Name: Death's Twin
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage. If you miss, you may keep making the attack until you hit.

Name: Twirling Towards Freedom
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, you can take an immediate (counter) action to shift 2 at any point during the turn of each enemy you targeted.

Name: End of the Beginning
Hit: 7dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can score a critical hit on a 19 as well as on a 20.

Name: Gentlefolk's Challenge
Hit:
1dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
*Level 21:* 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: The target is marked.

Name: Dance of Blades
Hit:
1dW + Dexterity modifier and you swap places with the target.
*Level 21:* 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Sure Thing
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Only Fooling
Trigger: You are prone, immobile, restrained, grappled or slowed.
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Special: You lose one condition that triggers this power, or you stand up from prone. Move up to your speed before making your attack.

Name: Scornful Laugh
Trigger: An enemy misses you with an attack.
Effect: The enemy takes a -4 penalty on attack rolls (save ends).

Name: Lunging Draw
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage and pull 1.

Name: Calling Card
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: Your allies get a +2 bonus on attack rolls against the target while you maintain this effect.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Throw Off
Effect: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Name: Through the Foot
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage and the target is immobile until the end of your next turn.

Name: Certain Strike
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage. On this attack, you can score a critical hit on a 16-20.

Name: Bravado
Effect: An attack against your Fortitude, Reflex or Will is instead made against your Armor Class.

Name: Fend Off Horde
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage and push a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
Boost: *Level 23:* 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and they are also knocked prone.

Name: Blur of Cloaks
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot target you with attacks. Even its Near and Far attacks ignore you.

Name: Harmless Misdirection
Trigger: You miss with a melee attack.
Effect:
You turn invisible until the end of your turn. 
*Lose momentum:* Until the start of your next turn.

Name: Press the Advantage
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage and push 1. You shift 1.
Effect:
Make a secondary attack against the same target. 
*Secondary Attack:* Dexterity vs. AC; 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage and push 1. You shift 1.
Boost: *Level 27:* Do 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage with each attack, and you push and shift equal to your Charisma modifier.

Name: Call Bid
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect:
Make a number of secondary attacks against the target equal to the number of times you declared that you would hit the target.
*Secondary Attack:* Dexterity vs. AC. 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Special: Before you use this power, announce how many times you will hit the target, between one and five. You can make this many secondary attacks. Count up all hits (including from your primary attack). For each attack you are short your bid, your enemy can make that many basic attacks against you.

Name: Rescuing Intercept
Special: Before your attack, an ally within Near range 10 shifts squares equal to your Charisma modifier. Then you teleport into their original space.

Name: Swift Riposte
Effect: Each time you are the target of an attack, you can make a basic melee or ranged attack against the attacker as an immediate (counter) action.
Maintain: Swift

Name: Dodge with Panache
Trigger: You are the target of an attack
Effect: The attacker must roll twice against you and every ally who is a target of the attack, taking the lower result each time.

Name: Lethal Misdirection
Trigger: An enemy targets you with an attack, and a different enemy is adjacent to you.
Defence: AC, against the enemy adjacent to you
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: The attack targets the enemy adjacent to you instead of you.

Name: Deflect Attack
Trigger: An enemy in reach targets you with an attack.
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage and the attack misses.

Name: Contagion
Range Details: 10, the closest enemy to the triggering creature within range
Trigger: A creature you have Claimed is reduced to 0 HP or below.
Hit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier poison damage and you have a Dark Claim on the target.

Name: Stab in the Soul
Hit: 1d12 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.
Special: You can use this power as a basic ranged attack.

Name: Burn It Off
Hit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Effect: You suffer a cumulative -1 penalty on attack rolls using this power for every time you have used it this encounter.
Special: You can use this power as a basic ranged attack.

Name: Redoubled Misery
Trigger: The target fails a saving throw
Hit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage and they suffer a -2 penalty on saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Name: Death Mark
Hit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage and the target gains vulnerability to all 5 until the end of your next turn.

Name: Least Binding
Effect: You summon a Small demon toad or Small hopping imp until the end of the encounter.

Name: Perverse Blessing
Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to defenses. If you are hit by an attack, you lose this bonus and instead get a -1 penalty to defenses. Until this power ends, you keep switching between bonus and penalty each time you are hit.

Name: Curse of the Odd
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, each time any creature rolls an odd number on an attack roll or saving throw, the target takes damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Name: Everburn
Hit: Persistent 5 fire damage (save ends) and vulnerability to fire (save ends).

Name: Minor Binding
Effect: You summon a Medium burner demon or Medium hellhound until the end of the encounter. If you summon the hellhound, choose one enemy within 10 squares to become the hellhound's quarry.

Name: Dance in Fire
Effect: When an enemy enters a square adjacent to you, it takes damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Name: Diseased Blood
Hit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier acid damage and you have a Dark Claim on the target.

Name: Mocking Curse
Trigger: The target fails an attack roll against you
Hit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage and the target is dazed (save ends).

Name: Lesser Binding
Effect: You summon a Large vulture demon, Medium hungry maw or Large hezrou until the end of the encounter.

Name: Flaming Teleport
Effect: Teleport to an unoccupied space adjacent to a creature that is taking persistent fire damage.

Name: Demonic Explosion
Trigger: One of your summoned monsters is reduced to 0 HP or below.
Hit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Special: The burst is centred on the triggering monster.

Name: Sadistic Shot
Hit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and you may spend a recovery to heal your recovery value in HP.

Name: Prestige Binding
Effect: You summon a Large big burner until the end of the encounter.

Name: Abyssal Bargain
Range Details: touch, one ally on 0 HP or below
Effect: The ally heals to maximum HP. You and the ally both have zero recoveries until the next long rest.

Name: Follow the Blood
Effect: Teleport to an unoccupied space adjacent to the target.

Name: Keep Burning Please
Trigger: The target makes a successful saving throw against persistent fire damage.
Hit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage and persistent fire damage 10 (save ends).

Name: Rabble Babble
Hit: The target is dazed (save ends). *Aftereffect:* The target takes damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Name: Advanced Binding
Effect: You summon a Medium frenzy demon, Large boar demon or Huge pincer demon until the end of the encounter.

Name: Golden Claw
Effect:
You conjure a Medium golden claw in your space. The claw carries you, giving you a fly speed of 12 (hover, maximum altitude 2). If you are subject to an opportunity attack, make the following secondary attack against the attacker.
*Secondary Attack:* Charisma vs Fortitude; 3d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. Then this power ends.

Name: Spreading the Rot
Hit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage and the target takes 10 ongoing necrotic damage (save ends). *Aftereffect:* The Claimed enemy of yours nearest the target takes 10 ongoing necrotic damage (save ends).

Name: Carrion Screech
Hit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage and the target gains vulnerability to all damage 10 (ongoing).

Name: Greater Binding
Effect: You summon a Large laughing demon until the end of the encounter.

Name: Killing Doubt
Hit: 4d10 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage. The target's next standard action must be a basic attack.

Name: Ultimate Binding
Effect: You summon a Large balor or Large marilith until the end of the encounter.

Name: Lift Spirits
Range Details: burst 5 (10 at level 11, 15 at level 21), one ally or yourself
Effect: The target spends a recovery and heals their recovery value plus your Charisma modifier.

Name: Wrong Place-Wrong Time
Effect: Shift your speed and gain a +5 power bonus to AC and Reflex defense until the start of your next turn.

Name: Biting Taunt
Hit: You mark the target until the start of your next turn. While the target is marked, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against its attacks, it is weakened for all attacks that do not include you, and if you score a critical hit against it, it is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Special: You can use this power as a basic attack.
Maintain: Swift: The target remains marked until the start of your next turn. You cannot sustain if you or the target ends its turn out of range.

Name: Failure to Communicate
Flavor: Events are not moving in your favor. You act in the best interest of the situation.
Effect: Make a basic attack.  After the attack, you can shift a square.
Special: If your target misses you with an attack before the start of your next turn, you can make a basic attack against it as an immediate (react) action.

Name: Who, Me?
Flavor: You claim ignorance in the situation, acting as the innocent or an ally of the opposite side. You seem trustworthy enough.
Range Details: burst 10, three creatures not within 3 of you
Hit: The target cannot make melee or ranged attacks against you until the start of your next turn. If you mark or inflict damage on the target, the effect ends and the target is immune to this power until thread of the encounter.

Name: Exploit Weakness
Flavor: Your enemy is not angry as much as confused by what you just said.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is immobile until the end of your next turn. If the target takes any damage from you or your allies, it immediately recovers from this effect.
Effect: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action). You cannot target the same creature.

Name: Personal Betrayal
Flavor: The enemy wasn't expecting your attack.  It wasn't even sure you were an enemy.  Well, now it does.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see that you have not damaged this encounter
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, whenever you make a damage roll against the target, you gain a power bonus to the roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Maintain: Swift: The effect persists.

Name: Parley
Flavor: You convince your enemy to settle down and pause, at least for a moment. It may not last, especially if an ally is aggressive.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is stunned (save ends). If the target takes any damage or is moved, the effect immediately ends and the target gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of its next turn.

Name: Forked Tongue
Flavor: The target is swayed by your magnetic charisma, the tone of your voice, and your general attitude.
Range Details: burst 5, one creature you can see
Requirement: You, the target, and the target’s allies have not been damaged this encounter.
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, your allies have concealment against the target and you gain a +3 power bonus to all Diplomacy and Bluff checks against it. If the target takes any damage while this power is in effect, it is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Maintain: Standard: The effect persists until the end of your next turn, until the target takes damage or until you take damage, whichever comes first.

Name: Grace Under Pressure
Flavor: You are suave and as cool as ice.  Even when the arrows fly, you act calmly.
Range Details: burst 5, each creature you can see
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC, Reflex defense and Will defense against the target.
Special: If you are hit by an attack before the start of your next turn, this power is not expended.

Name: Winning Smile
Effect: Double your Charisma modifier to Bluff or Diplomacy checks until the end of the encounter (or five minutes).

Name: Talk Down
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action). You cannot target the same opponent.

Name: Sow Distrust
Flavor: You convince an enemy with thrown voices, rocks, or any other diversion to choose another target.
Trigger: A creature makes a ranged attack against you or an adjacent ally.
Hit: The target’s attack is directed to any other target in range and line of sight (your choice).

Name: Perfect Masquerade
Flavor: Your accent and mannerisms are flawless. No matter the task or test, you can fake it.
Requirement: This power cannot be used if you, the target, or any of the target's allies has taken damage previously in the encounter.
Hit: Your allies gain concealment against the target, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Effect: You gain a +3 power bonus to Bluff checks and can make a Bluff check in place of any knowledge (but not monster knowledge) check until the end of your next turn.
Maintain: Standard: Repeat the attack.

Name: Cool Nerves
Flavor: The group is under fire. Tempers are fraying. Someone’s about ready to snap. You blurt out a comical remark that brings it all home.
Effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to Will defense until the end of the encounter. On his next turn, the target can either spend a healing surge or gain an additional move action.

Name: Fast-Talk
Flavor: While normal people bog down someone with a lot of useless banter, you get to the point, and it works.
Effect: You gain a +10 power bonus to your next Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate check, and you gain a +3 power bonus to all other skill checks with those skills until the end of the encounter (or five minutes).
Special: Spend an action point if you use this power during a skill challenge to gain another +10 power bonus.

Name: Smooth Talker
Flavor: You step in during an escalating conversation and attempt to smooth out the ripples of an impending confrontation. If the situation requires, you can also spot a liar.
Effect: Gain a +5 power bonus to your next Bluff, Diplomacy, Insight, or Perception check or your next attack with the psyche keyword.
Special: If you fail the check or miss with the attack, this power is not expended.

Name: Empathic Response
Flavor: "I know what you're going through. This is not the solution. We can make a deal. Just me...just talk to me. You know you can trust me."
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is marked and cannot make any attack that only includes you (save ends both).
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action). You cannot target the same creature.

Name: Instant Infatuation
Flavor: You say and do exactly what they want you to say or do, instantly enticing your target.
Range Details: burst 2, one creature you can see
Requirement: You, the target, and the target’s allies have not been damaged this encounter.
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, the target suffers a -4 penalty to Will defense and a -4 penalty to attack rolls with attacks that include you.
Miss: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +4 power bonus to Will defense against the target’s attacks and a +4 power bonus to Bluff and Diplomacy checks against the target.
Maintain: Swift: The effects persist.  You can sustain until you inflict damage on the target or until the target inflicts damage on you.

Name: Read Body Language
Flavor: You read your opponent’s movements and their next course of action. You throw a diversion to prevent concentration.
Trigger: One enemy in burst you can see uses a power.
Hit: The triggering power is expended and the target’s action is lost. If you score a critical hit, the target is also stunned until the start of your next turn.
Special: Spend a recovery as part of this power, but regain no hit points; instead, you recover the use of this power.

Name: I Know This Trick
Flavor: Your enemy attempts a tricky tactic you have been trained to avoid.
Trigger: You are affected by one following conditions that a save can end:  dazed, marked, slowed, or stunned.
Effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to saving throws against the triggering condition until you save.

Name: Gruff and Tough
Flavor: You snort and spout a boast about your abilities.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Effect: The target is stunned until the end of your next turn, and you push the target its speed.

Name: Center of Attention
Effect: You mark all enemies that can see you until the end of your next turn. You lose all benefits of cover or concealment. Until the end of your next turn, basic attacks only require a minor action.

Name: Backup Plan
Flavor: You realize things are going badly and act quickly with a backup.
Trigger: You make a Bluff, Diplomacy or Intimidate check and dislike the result.
Effect: Make a basic attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 3dW extra damage from the attack and is dazed (save ends). On a miss, half damage, and the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.

Name: Stunning Good Looks
Requirement: You, the target, and the target’s allies have not been damaged this encounter.
Hit: Until the end of your next turn, the target is dazed and helpless, and your allies gain concealment against it. You gain a +10 power bonus to your next Diplomacy or Bluff check against the target and a +5 bonus to all other Diplomacy and Bluff checks until the end of your next turn.
Miss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn and you gain a +3 bonus to all Diplomacy and Bluff checks until the end of your next turn.
Special: If the target takes any damage, he is no longer helpless, though he is still dazed.
Maintain: Standard:  The effect persists until the target takes damage or until you take damage.

Name: Method Acting
Flavor: You become the part. You take on the role so flawlessly, the old you is pushed away.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter (or five minutes), you gain a +5 power bonus to all Bluff and Intimidate checks and can use Bluff in place of any Intelligence- or Wisdom-based skill.

Name: Unshakable Persona
Flavor: You can recover in an instant, changing course fast enough that listeners didn’t even notice.
Trigger: You make any Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill check and dislike the result.
Effect: You succeed at the roll.

Name: Dazzling Personality
Flavor: You manage to direct your opponent to doing exactly what you wanted, even if your target wasn’t even aware of it.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is dominated until the start of your next turn.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action). You cannot target the same creature.

Name: Lead the Shot
Flavor: The time for talking is over.  You give your ally the sign to end the conversation.
Effect: The target can take any action available to it as an immediate interrupt until the start of your next turn. The target gains a +4 power bonus to attack rolls made as part of that action. Before or after your ally acts, you can take a move action.

Name: Intimate Assassin
Range Details: burst 1, one creature you can see
Requirement: This power cannot be used if you, the target, or any of the target's allies has taken damage previously in the encounter.
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target is stunned and helpless against your attacks.

Name: Butt In
Flavor: You step forward an instant before things go sour and you attempt to cool the situation or at least stall while others prepare.
Trigger: You roll for initiative.
Effect: Gain a +10 power bonus to initiative. If you act first in an encounter, you gain a surprise action which must be used for a power with the psyche keyword.

Name: All Attention
Flavor: You draw the attention of all those around, allowing allies to get into a better position.
Hit: The target is marked and cannot make attacks that do not include you until the end of your next turn. Each ally in burst can shift his speed.
Effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action). You cannot target the same creatures.

Name: Touched a Nerve
Flavor: You must have really said something to upset them.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Hit: The target is helpless (save ends).  If the target is hit by an attack, he is no longer helpless.

Name: Feign Mortality
Flavor: You lure your opponent with an award-winning performance faking injury, death, or vulnerability. When your enemy least suspects it, you strike.
Range Details: weapon, the creature that staggered you
Effect:
You appear to suffer from any condition. You can drop prone as part of this action. You gain a +10 bonus to Bluff checks to enforce the illusion. This effect lasts until you make the following attack.
*Attack:* As an immediate interrupt or as a minor action on your turn, make a basic attack against the target. You automatically score a critical hit, and deal 1dW extra damage.
Special: Spend a recovery as part of this power, but regain no hit points; instead, the power is not expended. It cannot be used more than once per encounter.

Name: Destructive Criticism
Flavor: You really know what to say to bring someone down.
Hit: The target fails its next saving throw or one condition with a finite duration lasts an additional round.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).
Maintain: Move:  Repeat the attack.  You can sustain until you miss.

Name: Commanding Presence
Flavor: You give the illusion of authority.
Range Details: burst 10, two creatures you can see
Hit: The target is dominated (save ends).

Name: Attack of Necessity
Flavor: Out of options, become a hero.
Hit: 1dW damage, and the target is pushed to the nearest empty square outside of the blast. If the target cannot move to the nearest empty square, the target takes additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier. Increase to 2dW damage at 21st level.
Special: If you do not move this turn, arc 4 instead.

Name: Micro Burst
Flavor: Your shots are more to impede enemies than kill them.
Range Details: burst 1 (weapon range), all creatures you can see
Hit: 1 damage and the target is slowed until the start of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, your Dexterity modifier in damage instead.

Name: Potential Push
Flavor: The power of your attack sends the enemy tumbling back.
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is pushed 1 square. If the target cannot be pushed because of an obstruction or difficult terrain, it takes additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier. Increase damage to 2dW + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.
Special: If you do not move this turn, the target is pushed 2 squares instead of 1 (and suffers the indicated damage if it cannot be pushed at least 2 squares).

Name: Rapid Shots
Flavor: You shoot towards an area.
Range Details: wall 3 (weapon range), all creatures in wall you can see
Hit: 1dW damage.  Increase damage to 2dW at 21st level.
Special: If you do not move this turn, wall 4 instead of a wall 3.

Name: Focused Shot
Flavor: You make a continuous stream of attacks against a single target.
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Special: If you do not move this turn, the target is also slowed or weakened (your choice) until the start of your next turn.

Name: Pinning Shot
Flavor: Your shots force an enemy down or to cover.
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the start of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, the target is immobile instead of slowed.
Maintain: Standard:  Repeat the attack against the same target.  You can sustain only once.

Name: Shot on the Run
Flavor: You lay down a line of shots as you make a dash across the enemy’s flank.
Range Details: wall 5 (weapon range), all creatures in wall you can see
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: Before the attack, you can run, shift, or walk as a normal move action; if you are wielding a weapon that normally incurs attack penalties when moving, this movement does not inflict those penalties.
Special: If you do not move this turn, wall 6.

Name: Wildfire
Flavor: There’s too many of them.  You keep the arrows coming and plow a road.
Hit: 1 damage, and the target is knocked prone and dazed until the start of your next turn.
Miss: The target is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, arc 7.

Name: Barbed Arrows
Flavor: Conserve arrows?  Why?
Trigger: You hit with an arc, burst, or wall attack.
Effect: Each creature you hit takes an additional 5 extra damage.

Name: Covering Shot
Flavor: You protect an ally’s movement through hostile terrain.
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobile and cannot make opportunity attacks until the start of your next turn.
Special:
You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).
If you do not move this turn, the target suffers a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the start of your next turn (this does not require a hit).

Name: Eye the Enemy
Flavor: You quickly ascertain your enemy’s tactics and motives.  You taunt him to reveal a weakness.
Trigger: You hit an enemy with a ranged weapon.
Effect: Add your Intelligence modifier to the damage roll of all hits against the target (including the triggering hit) until the start of your next turn.
Maintain: Minor: The effect persists. You can sustain until the target is staggered.

Name: Black Sky
Flavor: You unleash a hail of arrows so intense, enemies are sent flat on their backs.
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Miss: Half damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Special: If you do not move this turn, on a hit, the target also suffers 5 persistent damage (save ends).

Name: Standing Barrage
Flavor: You lay down a rain of arrows against entrenched or approaching foes.
Range Details: burst 1 (weapon range), all creatures you can see
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobile until the start of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, on a hit, the target suffers a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
Maintain: Move and Standard:  Repeat the attack against the same area.

Name: Chain Shots
Flavor: It almost feels like a game as enemies drop quickly in your path.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, roll twice for every attack roll (using ammunition with each roll) and take the higher result.

Name: Man Down!
Flavor: You drop to a knee by a fallen ally and ensure that ally is safe until help arrives.
Range Details: burst 6, one dead, prone, or unconscious ally in burst.
Effect: Shift into the target's square. The target cannot be the target of any ranged or melee attack and gains a +3 power bonus to all defenses against area attacks until the start of your next turn. The effect ends if the target stands or you leave the target's square.
Maintain: Swift: The effect persists until the start of your next turn.

Name: The Killing Field
Flavor: You hold your weapon back and wait for the advancing enemy. You have the entire battlefield in your view.
Effect:
You create a zone in the affected area. The zone lasts until the start of your next turn. It is considered difficult terrain. You can make the following attack against any creature that enters any square of the zone as an opportunity action: 
*Attack:* Dexterity vs. AC
*Hit:*  1dW + Dexterity modifier damage
Special: This power cannot be targeted by dispel magic.
Maintain: Standard: The zone persists until the start of your next turn. You can move the zone to a new area within range as part of this action.

Name: Tri-Shot
Flavor: To conserve arrows, you control your shots to specific targets rather than shooting chaotically at your foes.
Range Details: weapon, one, two or three creatures
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Force Back
Flavor: A nonstop rain of arrows tracks an assaulting or flanking enemy.
Range Details: burst 2 (weapon range), all creatures you can see
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobile until the end of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, the target suffers a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the start of your next turn whether or not you hit.
Maintain: Standard: Repeat the attack. You can shift the barrage up to 3 squares every turn. If you miss all targets in the burst, you can no longer sustain.

Name: Distracting Arrow
Flavor: Your attack is more of a diversion to allow others the opportunity to recover.
Trigger: You hit an enemy with a ranged weapon.
Effect: The target takes 1dW extra damage from the triggering attack. Two allies in line of sight can make saving throws against one condition a save can end.

Name: Battle Position
Flavor: Enemies are all around you. You need room to shoot.  You wave your bow wildly.
Effect: Shift your speed -2. You do not count as having moved for the purpose of Deadeye powers that get a benefit if you have not moved.

Name: Machine of Destruction
Flavor: This is what it all comes down to.  You and your weapon.  That's all that matters.
