Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you are immobile and the action required for any basic attack or at-will power is reduced from standard to move, or from move to swift.

Name: Clearing the Room
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares. If the target cannot be pushed 2 squares, it suffers an additional 1dW damage.
Special: If you do not move this turn, a hit target is pushed 4 squares and suffers additional damage if it cannot be pushed back 4 squares.

Name: Stacked Volleys
Flavor: You launch two identical volleys of arrows, nearly on top of each other. Opponents don't expect the second one as quickly.
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier, and the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.  If hit twice, the target is dazed (save ends).
Special: If you do not move this turn, gain a +1 bonus to each second attack.

Name: Tracking Shots
Flavor: As your first shot impacts, you gain vital information about wind direction and the agility of the target. Your second shot finds its place even easier.
Hit:
1dW + Dexterity modifier damage.  Make a secondary attack against the same target.
*Secondary Attack:*  Dexterity +2 vs. AC
*Hit:*  1dW + Dexterity modifier damage.  Make a tertiary attack against the same target.
*Miss:*  Half damage
*Tertiary Attack:*  Dexterity +4 vs. AC
*Hit:*  2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Wildfire Blitz
Flavor: You spray arrows across a massive area, holding back whole armies against your single defiant will.
Range Details: burst 4 (weapon range), all creatures you can see
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Bandit's Yell
Flavor: You scream loudly as you shake off the damage.
Trigger: You are affected by one of the following conditions that a save can end: blinded, dazed, marked, slowed, stunned, or weakened.
Effect: You gain a +5 bonus to the saving throw until you succeed.

Name: Toxophilite
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and a +4 bonus to damage rolls.

Name: Flurry of Arrows
Flavor: You unleash a flurry of arrows towards an enemy.
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage
Special:
If you do not move this turn, increase damage to 3dW + Dexterity modifier.

You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).

Name: Mosquito's Nip
Flavor: It is hard for your enemies to think of anything but you as you continue to rain steel from the sky.
Effect: Each enemy you hit with a ranged attack until the end of your next turn is marked until the end of your next turn.  If your marked target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and a +4 bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.
Maintain: Move:  The effect persists.

Name: Mindless Mayhem
Flavor: You send a tsunami of arrows into the enemy.
Range Details: weapon, one two or three enemies
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is pushed a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier and is weakened until the start of your next turn.
Miss: Half damage and the target is weakened until the start of your next turn.
Special:
If you do not move this turn, you can target up to 4 enemies instead of 3 and make 4 attacks instead of 3; you must target at least two separate creatures.

You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).

Name: Suppressing Shots
Flavor: You cover an area with arrows to keep enemies from moving.
Range Details: burst 2 (weapoon range), all creatures you can see
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Effect: You create a zone in the burst that persists until the start of your next turn. Creatures that enter the zone or start their turns in it take 1dW damage and are slowed (save ends). You use ammunition each time you inflict damage.
Special:
This power cannot be targeted by *dispel magic*.

If you do not move this turn, burst 3.
Maintain: Move: The effect persists.

Name: New Position
Flavor: The effectiveness of your current location is in question.  You quickly move to better ground.
Effect: Shift your speed.

Name: Cloud of Hellfire
Flavor: Your shots pepper the ground, sending up debris, hampering vision and movement.
Range Details: burst 4 (weapon range), all creatures you can see
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, the area becomes difficult terrain and targets in the area grant combat advantage to anyone outside the area.
Special: If you do not move this turn, burst 5.
Maintain: Move:  The effect persists.  You use additional ammunition each time you sustain equal to one attack roll.

Name: Clear the Ground
Flavor: You cut down trees, walls, bushes, and people--anything that gets in your way.
Range Details: burst 5 (weapon range), all creatures you can see
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, all difficult terrain in the area is no longer difficult terrain.
Special: If you do not move this turn, 3dW damage

Name: Behemoth-Killer
Flavor: You relax as you loose the arrow.  It’s not like you can miss.
Range Details: burst 5 (weapon range), one Large or larger creature you can see
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Special: If you do not move this turn, increase to 4dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Overwatch
Flavor: You keep a careful eye on an ally or allies from an advantageous position, and wait for enemies to poke out their heads.
Range Details: burst 3 (weapon range, minimum 10), all creatures you can see
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, burst 4
Maintain: Standard: Repeat the attack against the same area. On a hit, you deal no additional damage but the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Name: One on One
Flavor: Your opponent is a lone creature of incredible power. You aim for this single target and release everything.
Hit: 4dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, you can reroll all 1s on any damage dice for this power until the result is anything but a 1.
Maintain: Standard:  Repeat the attack against the same target.  You cannot maintain if you missed on your previous turn.

Name: Cone of Barbs
Flavor: You sweep your weapon wide, attacking everything in front of you.
Range Details: arc 8, all creatures you can see
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone and dazed until the end of your next turn.
Miss: Half damage, and the target is knocked prone and dazed until the end of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, targets in Near arc 3 take 1dW extra damage.

Name: Selective Shots
Flavor: You've trained enough to know the difference between friend and enemy.  You no longer need to lay down broad volleys of arrows.
Range Details: weapon, five creatures, each no more than 3 squares from another target.
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage
Effect: The target is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Special: If you do not move this turn, each target can be no more than 5 squares away from another.

Name: Finish the Job
Flavor: After an onslaught of arrows, one target still didn't fall. You turn your attention and ensure it follows your advice.
Range Details: weapon, one creature you hit this round as part of a Far attack
Hit: 3dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Special: If you do not move this turn, 4dW + Dexterity modifier damage

Name: Fall of Heaven
Flavor: You crash the pillars and bring down the sky, raining steel, offloading everything you have.
Range Details: weapon, all enemies you can see
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Special: If you do not move this turn, 2dW + Dexterity modifier + Intelligence modifier damage.

Name: Measured Response
Flavor: You respond to an attack with a proportionate level of aggression.
Range Details: burst 1 (weapon range), all creatures you can see
Hit: 4dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Miss: Half damage and if the target is bloodied before or after the initial damage, it takes an additional 1dW damage (not halved).
Effect: If the target is staggered before or after the initial damage, it takes an additional 2dW damage.

Name: Spirit's Prank
Trigger: Your ranged attack misses a target
Effect: Make a ranged basic attack against a creature within 5 of the triggering target.

Name: Grasping Vines
Effect: The target is pushed 1 and slowed until the end of your next turn.
Special:
*Level 11:* Range is now burst 2.
*Level 21:* Range is now burst 3.

Name: Unleashed Spirit
Trigger: A melee attack misses you.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage and push 1.

Name: Sprouting Overwatch
Flavor: You cover a person or area and attack anything that gets too close.
Effect: You can make a regular ranged basic attack against one creature that enters any square of the target area as an immediate interrupt until the start of your next turn. After you make this attack, all enemies treat the area as difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

Name: Swift Strike
Flavor: You find a split-second opening and deliver the attack, hoping to hold the enemy back.
Hit: Dexterity (ranged) or Strength (melee) modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.

Name: Passing Kill
Flavor: A mere low-level thug blocks your path.  You don’t even give him the luxury of losing momentum.
Defence: AC, you cannot score a critical hit
Hit: 1 point of damage.
Special: At 21st level, you can make two attacks.

Name: Spherical Defense
Flavor: Your enemy tries to find a weakness.  It finds none.
Effect: You do not grant combat advantage until the start of your next turn.

Name: Counter-Surge
Flavor: An opponent strikes you with an attack.  You take the impact and channel it into strength.
Trigger: You take damage from a non-critical melee or ranged attack.
Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt (to a maximum of your recovery value).

Name: Faster Than The Hammer
Flavor: You hear your enemy's muscles twitch as the trigger is pulled.
Trigger: A creature makes a ranged attack against you.
Effect: Make a basic attack against the target.  The target suffers a -4 penalty to the triggering attack roll.

Name: Flow or Crash
Flavor: Become what you need to survive. Adapt, flow, slide, and prove yourself.
Effect: You gain a move action.

Name: False Strike
Flavor: Your first strike was intentionally lackluster to trick your opponent into a mistake. You counter and strike hard before he realizes his folly.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Shift to any adjacent square to the target and repeat the attack.  Don't repeat if you miss with the second attack.

Name: Idle Hands
Flavor: Your limbs seemingly act on their own as your concentrate on other matters.
Effect: You gain an additional action on this turn and on your next turn.

Name: Reflex Shot
Flavor: Your training creates an instinctual reaction if an ally is struck down.
Trigger: An ally becomes staggered.
Effect: Make a basic attack against the target, and the target misses with its attack.

Name: All or Nothing
Flavor: You strike so fast, both attacks are literally too close to distinguish them.
Trigger: You hit an enemy.
Effect: The target takes 2dW extra damage from the triggering attack and is knocked prone.

Name: Swell of Discipline
Flavor: Your body moves faster than others can blink and without warning, you have either vanished or your enemies around have fallen at your feet.
Effect: Until the end of your turn, all powers you use have their actions reduced from standard to move, or move to swift.
Special: When you complete a streak, you recover the use of this power.

Name: Nerve Cluster
Flavor: Your attack temporarily paralyzes your opponent.  They don't soon recover from that strike.
Range Details: weapon, one creature marked by you
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed, weakened, and suffers a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Miss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Maintain: Standard:  Repeat the attack against the same target.  You cannot sustain if you miss.

Name: An Unwise Action
Flavor: Enemies train their weapons.  You advise your opponents of the wisdom of such a risk, and then show them why.
Range Details: burst 1, all enemies you can see
Effect: The target drops any weapons it is holding, and you make a basic attack against each target.
Special: You can choose to use any weapon the target drops for your basic attack/s. You can drop any weapons you grab this way as part of this power.

Name: Mission Objective
Flavor: While everyone attacks, you make a move to the goal.
Trigger: You hit an enemy.
Effect: The target takes 2dW extra damage from the triggering attack, and it cannot attack you until the start of your next turn unless that attack includes at least one other creature.

Name: Attack Deflection
Flavor: You maneuver in such a way to direct the attack to an enemy nearby.
Effect: The attack hits the target instead of you. If not in reach or in line of sight to the attack, shunt the target to the nearest square to place it in reach or in line of sight. Shift your speed and make a basic attack.
Special: If the target is reduced to 0 HP or below by this power, you recover the use of this power.

Name: Delayed Death Touch
Flavor: With a twist in the right position, your attack carries a powerful energy that shatters your opponent's bones and ruptures his organs.
Trigger: You score a critical hit.
Effect: The target makes a saving throw at the end of each turn; when it fails, it takes 7d10 points of damage.

Name: Devastating Body Attack
Flavor: You make the target think it just got struck by a gorilla … riding a horse.
Range Details: weapon, one creature two squares away
Hit:
1dW + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. When rolling damage, reroll all 1s until they come up as something other than a 1. If the target cannot be pushed because of an obstruction, you inflict maximum damage.
*Level 21:* Increase to 2dW damage.
Effect: Before your attack, shift into a square adjacent to the target.

Name: Inconsequential Injury
Flavor: Nothing clears the head like hurting something else.
Effect: Select one condition you suffer from. Gain a +4 bonus to the saving throw against that condition until you pass. When you pass, you gain two basic attacks.

Name: The Behemoth
Flavor: You lift up a few inches and widen your stance.  You find a newly found surge of adrenaline.
Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to twice your Strength modifier.
Special: Use a standard action and a move action instead of a swift action with this power and gain temporary hit points equal to twice your Constitution and Strength modifier.

Name: For the Common Honor
Flavor: In an instant, you weigh the options and realize someone else’s life is more vital than your own.
Trigger: One staggered ally in range is hit by an attack that does not include you.
Effect: You are hit by the attack instead of the ally.

Name: I’m the Juggernaut
Flavor: You ignore any obstacles as you plow through terrain and opponents.
Effect: Shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier, ignoring difficult terrain. You can move through enemies' squares during this movement. Non-creature obstructions in squares you attempt to enter take damage equal to 5 × your Strength modifier: if this destroys the obstruction, you can enter the square.

Name: Out of the Fire
Flavor: You know when to fight and when not to.  You grab an ally and pull back.
Trigger: You hit one creature
Effect:
The target takes 1dW extra damage from the triggering attack.

*Secondary Effect:* You and one adjacent ally can shift a number of squares equal to 1+ your Strength modifier. You and the ally must be adjacent at the end of the shift.

Name: The Bulldozer
Flavor: You slowly approach your enemies, pushing your advancing line and claiming more of the battlefield.
Range Details: burst 6, the nearest enemy you can see
Effect: Shift one square towards the target.  You gain resist 5 all damage until the start of your next turn.
Maintain: Move: The effect persists. If you enter a square adjacent to the target, drop the target to 0 hit points or fewer, cannot move, or if you voluntarily move away from the target, you cannot maintain.

Name: Just Like Elias
Flavor: Despite injuries and your brain telling you you’re done, your body refuses to fall.
Effect: You regain hit points equal to twice your Strength modifier plus twice your Constitution modifier.

Name: He Ain't Heavy
Flavor: You grab a fallen ally and throw them over your shoulder as you withdraw.
Range: burst 6, one unconscious or otherwise helpless ally
Effect:
Shift into the ally's occupied square.

*Secondary Effect:*  Make a basic attack.  One hit creature takes 2dW extra damage
*Miss:*  Half damage
*Tertiary Effect:*  Shift a number of squares equal to 1+ your Constitution or Strength modifier, and shunt the target with you.

Name: The Runaway Boulder
Flavor: You barrel through terrain and people and anchor yourself further up the line.
Effect: Shift your speed +2. Until the end of your next turn, you gain resist 10 all damage. You are not considered moving for the purposes of using firearms.
Special: If you complete a streak, you recover the use of this power.

Name: Like An Elephant
Flavor: You offer your shoulder to enemies you plow through, slamming them back and clearing a way.
Range: weapon, each enemy in reach during your shift
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares and knocked prone.
Effect: Before your attacks, shift your speed. You can pass through enemy occupied squares.

Name: Down Fighting
Flavor: You ignore all those pesky holes and bleeding wounds.  You refuse to accept humiliation.  You will not fall before winning a fight.
Trigger: You are reduced to 0 or fewer hit points
Effect: Until the start of your next turn, you are dazed, but do not fall unconscious, make death saves, or die from reaching your negative bloodied value in hit points; you also gain a +4 power bonus to all attack & damage rolls.
Special: If you are still alive at the end of the encounter, you automatically stabilize at 0 hit points.
Maintain: Free: The effect persists. If you do not hit with an attack before the start of your next turn, you are considered to have failed a death save.

Name: The Fortress
Flavor: You're an immovable object--a rooted post for allies to rally back to.
Effect: You gain regeneration 5 until the end of your next turn. You grant cover to all allies in adjacent squares, regardless of line of sight.
Maintain: Move:  The effect persists. You cannot sustain if you leave your current square.

Name: In The Face
Flavor: An enemy raises his club, sword, or any other archaic implement of barbarity and you respond with your own medieval response.
Trigger: One enemy hits you with an opportunity attack.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage, and the attack misses.
Special: Spend a recovery, but regain no hit points; instead, you recover the use of this power.

Name: Nosebleed
Flavor: You sniff up the blood, bark loudly, and assault the newly frightened enemy.
Trigger: One enemy scores a critical hit on you.
Effect:
The hit only inflicts normal damage.  Make a basic attack: one hit creature takes 1dW extra damage

*Secondary Effect:*  Gain a +2 bonus to all attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter against the triggering enemy.

Name: Just Got the Wind Knocked
Flavor: What? Nah, nah, I’m doing just fine.
Trigger: You take damage from an attack.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you suppress all effects of the attack. At the end of the encounter, you immediately suffer these effects.

Name: Just Walk It Off
Flavor: You know perfectly well how much damage was done.  You attempt to ignore it and continue the fight.
Hit: 4dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Spend a recovery and regain double your recovery value.

Name: Blatant Disregard For Personal Safety
Flavor: You walk in the open, brazenly approaching your foe without care or concern.
Effect: Shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier. Make three basic attacks at any point during the move. Each time you miss with an attack roll, you can spend a recovery and heal your recovery value in hit points.

Name: Behind Me!
Flavor: Your ally uses you as cover as you march towards your enemy.
Effect: Each target can shift its speed. They must remain in adjacent squares at the end of the move. Each target can use one attack power at any point during the move. Until the end of your next turn, you grant cover to adjacent allies.

Name: Rope-A-Dope
Flavor: You confuse your enemy with one hand but strike fast with the other. You weave around your opponent in the confusion.
Hit:
1dW + Strength modifier damage.
*Level 21:* 2dW + Strength modifier.
Effect: Shift to any square adjacent to the target.  You either push the target 1 square or shunt it into the square you just occupied.

Name: All-Out Strike
Flavor: You lean in and give it all you've got.
Hit:
1dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is pushed one square. If the target cannot be pushed because of an obstruction, the target takes additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
*Level 21:* 2dW + Strength modifier.

Name: Unbalancing Strike
Flavor: A quick jab is better than a heavier thrust which can throw you off balance.
Hit:
1dW damage, and you gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.
*Level 21:* 2dW.

Name: Full Sweep
Flavor: You spin around, attacking all targets around you.
Range Details: burst 1, all enemies you can see
Defence: Reflex (you may determine the type of attack separately for each target.)
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage (Ac), or no damage, and the target is knocked prone and dazed until the start of your next turn (Reflex).

Name: Sudden Leap
Flavor: You vault in the air and deliver a crippling blow from up high.
Hit:
1dW + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target one square.  You shift into the square the target previously occupied.

If the target cannot be pushed, the target is knocked prone and you shift into the occupied square.
Miss: No damage, and you shift to an adjacent square to the target.

Name: C-C-C-Combo Breaker
Flavor: You strike when the enemy least suspects it, through an assumed impenetrable defense.
Trigger: One enemy makes a melee attack against you.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: You gain a +3 power bonus to Ac until the end of your next turn.

Name: Insult to Injury
Flavor: A noble warrior doesn't kick someone when they're down. You're not that noble.
Trigger: One enemy is knocked prone.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares. If the target cannot be pushed 3 squares because of an obstruction, both the obstruction and the target take 1d6 + your Constitution modifier damage.
Miss: Half damage, and the target is not pushed.
Special: You can use this power as a swift action or an immediate reaction.

Name: Redirection of Energy
Flavor: You utilize the direction of your enemy’s attack injury into a counter-maneuver.
Trigger: You are hit by a melee or ranged attack by an adjacent enemy.
Effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to AC and Reflex defense against the attack. Shift to any other square adjacent to the target and gain combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Name: Roll With It
Flavor: You take an injury and fall back, hoping to diminish the severity of the impact.
Trigger: You are struck with a non-critical melee or ranged attack.
Effect: You shift 1 square away from the triggering attacker and only suffer 1 point of damage from the hit. If you cannot move away from the attacker, you may not use this power.

Name: Mistaken Aggravation
Flavor: You might have misjudged this opponent.  Time for a strategic withdrawal.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Shift your speed.  You must take the most direct path away from the target.

Name: Adaptable Warrior
Flavor: Being able to adapt to any situation is the mark of any master of the martial arts.
Attack: Strength +1 vs. AC (2 attacks) or Strength +4
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage.
Special: You can use this power again if you spend an action point to use it.

Name: Overreach Lunge
Flavor: Your opponent thinks they are safe.  Prove them wrong.
Range Details: weapon, one creature 1 square beyond your reach
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Shift to any square adjacent to the target.

Name: Flawless Victory
Flavor: Your enemy is near defeat.  Use all remaining reserves for a decisive win.
Hit: 4dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: If the attack does not drop the target to 0 hit points or fewer, you grant combat advantage to the target until the end of your next turn. If the target hits you before the start of your next turn, you grant combat advantage until the end of your following turn.

Name: Hip Throw
Flavor: You and your opponent are in a clinch. You utilize leverage and superior balance to toss your enemy down.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage, and you shunt the target 3 squares, knock it prone and daze it until the end of your next turn.
Miss: Half damage, and you shunt the target 3 squares.

Name: Smack-Attack
Flavor: Your opponent charges you.  You direct their energy past you.
Trigger: A creature hits you with a non-critical melee attack or a charge.
Effect: The attack misses. Shift to any square adjacent to the triggering attacker, and it grants you combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Name: Consequential Attack
Flavor: You throw yourself to such a degree into the attack, you leave yourself vulnerable.
Range Details: weapon, one creature 1 square beyond your reach
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage + Constitution modifier.
Effect: Regardless if you hit, you grant combat advantage to all enemies until the start of your next turn.

Name: Jaw Strike
Flavor: You connect hard, sending a bolt of pain into your opponent's head.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is pushed 1 square, knocked prone, and dazed until the start of your next turn.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).

Name: Knock-Out Button
Flavor: You hit that sweet spot.  Hopefully it's lights out for your opponent.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone and stunned (save ends).
Miss: Your next attack roll with this power suffers a -1 penalty.  After three misses, this power is no longer reliable.

Name: Free Hand
Flavor: You see a split-second opening to take a passing strike, given a free appendage to do so.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage.

Name: Last Second Recovery
Flavor: You jump back, shake your head, clear your mind, and ready yourself to push back into the fight.
Effect: Shift to the nearest square not in reach of an enemy and spend a recovery to heal equal to your recovery value.

Name: Pound for Pound
Flavor: All things being equal . . . you have no equal.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, your at-will powers that require a standard action only require a move action, and those that require a move action only require a swift action.

Name: Snap-Sweep
Flavor: You drop and spin around, tripping your opponent and making them open for another attack.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Name: Vicious Hook
Flavor: You bend your arm and shift your weight.  Your throw everything into a solid strike with knockout power.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the start of your next turn.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).

Name: Battle Stride
Flavor: Whether you barrel in or elegantly weave through, you fight your way past enemy lines.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Effect: Before your attack, shift up to 3 squares. After your attack, shift 3 squares and repeat the attack against a different target.  Then shift 3 squares and repeat the attack against a third target. Then shift 1 square.

Name: Roundhouse Attack
Flavor: In the air, with a circular sweep, you cut all your enemies down.  Yeah, it works.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is pushed 1 square. If the target cannot be pushed due to an obstruction, the target takes additional damage equal to twice your Constitution modifier.
Miss: Half damage, and the target is pushed 1 square.

Name: Gambit Recovery
Flavor: You give your opponent the impression you’re not in your game. An uncharacteristic miss is instantly followed up with another attempt.
Trigger: You miss with an attack roll.
Effect: Reroll until the result is higher than the triggering attack roll.

Name: Knockout Power
Flavor: You've been working out.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter (or five minutes), the damage die of your unarmed attacks increases by one step (1d4 > 1d6 > 1d8 > 1d10 > 1d12 > 2d6 > 2d8 > 2d10).

Name: String-Combo
Flavor: You mount attack upon attack so rapidly, your enemy is unable to defend himself.
Defence: AC, three attacks. Resolve each attack before making the next.
Hit: 1dW + Strength modifier damage. Gain a cumulative +2 bonus to additional attack rolls with this power. If you hit the target with all three attacks, you inflict additional damage equal to twice your Strength modifier.

Name: Wear Them Down
Flavor: You pound upon your foe in hopes of breaking his spirit.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened and dazed until the end of your next turn. If you hit the target with both attacks, the target is weakened and dazed (save ends) and cannot save until the end of your next turn.

Name: Lights Out
Flavor: You strike your opponent at a tender spot, just behind the head or under the jaw. Your enemy falls limp before you.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is unconscious (save ends). The moment the target takes any further damage, it immediately wakes up.

Name: Off the Bone
Flavor: Your enemy's tendons snap and bones break.
Hit: 4dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target suffers ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Miss: Half damage and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Name: Blocking Pose
Flavor: You change your guard to withstand punishment from oncoming attacks.
Effect: Take half damage from all melee attacks until the start of your next turn.
Maintain: Move:  The effect persists.  You cannot maintain if you move from your square or an enemy scores a critical hit against you.

Name: Calculated Strike
Flavor: You make a quick determination upon the best course of action, sacrificing accuracy for power.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: For every -2 penalty you accept on this attack (maximum -6) the attack deals +1dW damage.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).

Name: Spherical Discipline
Flavor: You lash at opponents all around, striking behind, in front, and in blind spots.
Hit: 2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and weakened until the end of your next turn.
Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to Ac until the end of your next turn.

Name: Master Combo
Flavor: Your opponents have never seen talent like this. Your resolve is absolute. There could be ten times more men against you and it still wouldn't matter.
Effect: Use three at-will powers.  You can select the same power multiple times.
Special: When you complete a streak, you recover the use of this power.

Name: Roundabout Strike
Flavor: After your opponent is temporarily dazed, you slide to another position for a follow-up attack.
Hit:
3dW + Strength modifier damage

*Effect:*  Shift to any unoccupied square adjacent to the enemy and make a secondary attack.

*Secondary Attack:*  Strength vs. Ac

*Hit:*  2dW + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone and cannot stand (save ends).

Name: Flow Like Water
Flavor: You pass through enemy lines without worry, crashing into whatever foes you wish.
Hit: 3dW + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: Shift to any square adjacent to the target.
Maintain: Standard:  Repeat the attack against a different target.

Name: Sure-Kill
Flavor: One single strike is all you'll need. You crush your opponent and strike fear into all those around with such a brutal act of violence.
Hit: 6dW + Strength modifier damage, and all enemies in a burst 5 of the target are stunned until the end of your next turn.

Name: Magic Touch
Flavor: You’ve read books where wizards use rays of frost or scorching bursts. To you, these weren’t works of fiction. These were options.
Hit:
1d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage and the target takes half damage at the start of your next turn.

Increase to 2d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage at 21st level.

Name: Thermodynamic Bolt
Flavor: With only the slightest catalyst, you catch a personification of a classical element and hurl it towards the enemy.
Hit: 1d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage. Increase damage to 2d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage at 21st level.

Name: Entropic Burst
Flavor: With a maneuver you try not to look like a pirouette from a ballet, you shift the air density around you, creating a vortex to knock away your enemies.
Hit: 1d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage, and the target is pushed to the nearest adjacent square outside the burst. If the target hits an obstruction, it is knocked prone.
Miss: Half damage, but the target is still pushed.
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Burst +2.
Boost:
**Level 13:** Near burst 4 and 2d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage.
**Level 27:** Near burst 6 and 4d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage.

Name: Bottled Thermodynamic Transfer
Flavor: You bind a localized severe temperature change to your hand and hurl it to your foes.
Hit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier cold/fire damage.
Effect:
You can make either a second attack against the target or attack each enemy adjacent to the target. 

*Secondary Hit:* 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Ranged 40.
Boost:
**Level 13:** Primary damage 3d8 + Dexterity modifier, secondary damage 2d8 + Dexterity modifier.
**Level 27:** Primary damage 4d8 + Dexterity modifier, secondary damage 3d8 + Dexterity modifier.

Name: Resonant Ray
Flavor: You hold your hand to the ground and a line of fire or jag-ged ice spreads across the surface to strike your foes.
Hit:
2d8 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage, and until the end of your next turn the target is:
* immobile (if cold).
* weakened (if fire).
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Wall 12.
Boost:
**Level 15:** Two rays and 3d8 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage.
**Level 29:** Three rays, 4d8 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage, and condition duration is save ends.

Name: Thermal Absorption
Flavor: Regardless of the temperature, it’s all just levels of entropy which you can absorb.
Trigger: You are about to take damage matching your flux energy.
Effect: Instead of taking damage, you recover hit points up to your recovery value. The excess damage is ignored.

Name: Elemental Restraint
Flavor: You employ your element to grab your target. You can either hold them in place or fling them across a room.
Hit:
1d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage, and you inflict additional effects based on your flux energy.

* Cold: The target is immobile in an ice cage, blocking line of sight, and cannot break free until it inflicts damage on the ice equal to twice your level plus your Dexterity modifier.
* Fire: You inflict additional damage equal to your level and can shunt the target as many squares as your Dexterity modifier.

Name: Thermal Isolation
Flavor: You pick one location and radically affect its entropic state. This could freeze a target in its spot or light it on fire.
Hit:
2d8 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage, and you inflict additional effects based on your flux energy.

* Cold: The target is restrained until the end of your next turn.
* Fire: If the target does not drop prone on its next turn, it suffers an additional 10 fire damage.

Name: Expanding Phase Transition
Flavor: With feet firmly planted, your send out a radiating expanse of altered terrain, either coated in ice or setting it ablaze; either result should impede your enemies.
Effect:
The effect is determined by your flux energy.

* Cold: You can create either a sheet of smooth ice or a sheet of ice spikes. If smooth, targets which enter an affected square are knocked prone. If spiked, the field is difficult terrain and creatures which enter an affected square suffer 1d4 + Dexterity modifier damage (this ends the effect for that square). A cold expanse lasts until the end of the encounter or five minutes.
* Fire: The field is difficult terrain and targets which enter an affected square suffer 1d6 + Dexterity modifier damage. A fire expanse lasts until the end of your next turn.
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Increase the burst range by 2 squares.
Maintain: Move: The fire expanse persists until the end of your next turn.
Boost: **Level 19:** Increase the blast radius to close burst 8.

Name: Frozen Creation
Flavor: You use ambient water to quickly create something useful.
Effect: You can create simple objects made of ice, such as bridges, walls, pillars, or furniture. The objects can sustain weight but are not durable, and will shatter if they suffer more than 10 points of damage.

Name: Thermal Wall
Flavor: You throw up a wall of ice or a sheet of fire to discourage attack.
Effect:
You erect a ten foot high wall which blocks line of sight. You gain additional effects based on your elemental focus.
* Cold: The ice wall is solid and can grant cover. The wall can withstand 50 points of damage before shattering. The wall remains until destroyed or until you cancel the effect.
* Fire: The wall grants resist 3 all damage to anyone behind it. Creatures can attempt to pass through the wall but suffer 3d6 fire damage. The wall lasts until the end of your next turn.
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Wall 10.
Maintain: Minor: The fire wall persists until the end of your next turn.

Name: Broken Equilibrium
Flavor: You release a pellet sized thermodynamic catalyst which upon impact creates an instant shift in the surrounding energy levels.
Hit:
3d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage. You gain additional effects based on your flux energy: 
* Cold: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
* Fire: If the target moves more than two squares on its next turn, it suffers 5 fire damage.
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Increase the burst range by 2 squares.
Boost: **Level 23:** Area burst 4 within 20 squares and 4d6 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage.

Name: Dynamic Tempest
Flavor: People believe you able to control weather. They may even ascribe a nickname to you. Squall? No. Hurricane? No… something, shorter.
Effect: You create a localized storm in the area of effect which lasts until the end of your next turn. It grants concealment and any creature that starts its turn in the tempest takes cold damage equal to your level and is slowed. If you move, the storm moves with you.
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Close burst 8.
Maintain: Standard: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Name: Halo of Fire
Flavor: Those around believe the word is coming to end. You surround targets in a circle of flame and then close the hole around them.
Hit: 4d6 + Dexterity modifier fire damage, and the target is pulled 1 square towards the center, starting with the nearest target. The last target moved suffers additional 2d6 + Dexterity modifier fire damage.
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Far burst 5.

Name: Thermal Shield
Flavor: You protect yourself and all those around you with your power.
Effect:
You erect a dome ten feet high wall which blocks line of sight. You gain additional effects based on your elemental focus.

* Cold: The dome is solid and can withstand 100 points of damage before shattering. Creatures within cannot leave until the dome is shattered or dismissed, but cannot be targeted from outside. The dome lasts until destroyed or until you cancel the effect.
* Fire: The burst creates a wall of fire in the outermost squares that grants resist 3 all damage to those inside it. Creatures can attempt to pass through the wall but suffer 4d6 fire damage. The wall lasts until the end of your next turn.
Special: **Elemental Attunement:** Near burst 5.

Name: Rocket Propulsion
Flavor: With enough influence over the transfer of energy, you’re able create a sustainable thermal reaction you can use to enable flight.
Effect: You gain a fly speed of 8 until the end of your next turn. Each creature adjacent to your launch square take 5 points of fire damage.
Maintain: Swift: Your fly speed persists until the end of your next turn. If you do not sustain and are still in the air at the start of the following turn, you fall.

Name: Blood Tell
Flavor: Humans are 90% water. Humans are in a state of entropy which you can alter. This won’t look pretty.
Hit: 4d10 + Dexterity modifier [flux] damage, and the target is weakened and dazed (save ends). If the target dies, it explodes.
Miss: Half damage and the target can still explode.

Name: Ice Castle
Flavor: They say when you become an adult, you put away childish things; but when you can make a fort out of ice, some things will never change.
Effect: You create a single room (no more than sixteen squares) structure out of ice, including furnishings if desired. If the structure is constructed in an area below freezing, it will persist indefinitely: otherwise, it will persist for 24 hours before melting.
Maintain: Standard and Move: Create another room, or expand the size of an existing one.

Name: Dismiss
Flavor: This attack ‘softly’ removes an enemy from your presence.
Hit:
1dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage and push 2. 
*Level 21:* 2dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Special: If the target is undead, push 4 on a hit.

Name: Expose Weakness
Flavor: You strike with a weak, but swift, attack that hampers an opponent.
Hit: The creature is weakened and slowed (save ends both).

Name: Staunching Strike
Flavor: To help your allies and harm your enemies is the most basic tenet of the Radiant Dawn discipline.
Hit: 2dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. You or an ally within sight can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value.

Name: Spoils of War
Flavor: Might makes right.
Hit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, each time an ally within 3 hits with an attack, they heal damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Name: Bolster
Flavor: You fortify an ally with akasha, hardening their skin like the scales of a dragon.
Effect: The ally gains resistance to all 5 until the end of your next turn. *Level 11:* 10. *Level 21:* 15.

Name: The Caged Sun
Effect: You cannot heal creatures other than yourself, or enable other creatures to spend recoveries. However, all healing you receive is doubled. If you receive healing but are already at maximum HP, you gain that amount as temporary HP instead.
Special: If you are staggered, you can enter this stance as an immediate (react) action.

Name: Decree of Mercy
Flavor: A simple look and gesture can weaken one’s resolve to kill.
Hit: Attacks the target makes until the end of your next turn are nonlethal.

Name: Curate’s Strike
Flavor: This strike was created by a kobold leader to fight both controlling magics and vicious wounds.
Hit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. You or an ally within sight can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value. They also gain a +2 bonus on saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Name: Witness to Glory
Flavor: With a surge of akasha, you spur an ally into battle.
Trigger: Initiative is rolled.
Effect: The ally receives a +4 power bonus to initiative. They add your Wisdom modifier to their speed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Healer’s Bane
Flavor: Made to combat other practitioners of the Radiant Dawn discipline, this maneuver hijacks healing for one’s own purpose.
Trigger: The creature is about to heal.
Effect: The creature does not heal, but does lose a recovery. Pick an ally within range. They heal equal to their recovery value.

Name: Decree of Purity
Flavor: A single word and a wave of the hand purifies those who would stand with you.
Effect: The target makes a saving throw against persistent damage or a condition with a save-ends duration.

Name: Armaments of the Empire
Flavor: A thin layer of akasha flows forth from you and covers your and your allies’ weapons.
Hit: 3dW + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, all allies within 5 gain a +2 power bonus on attack rolls.

Name: Decree of Death
Flavor: You single out targets for execution.
Hit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Name: Disrupt Essence
Flavor: A powerful blow that disrupts one’s essence, inhibiting the use of abilities.
Hit: 2dW + Wisdom modifier damage and the target cannot use encounter, daily or refresh powers until the end of your next turn.

Name: Lifeburst Strike
Flavor: You strike out with a simple blow with an uncanny power to heal and harm.
Hit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, if an ally of yours hits the target, the ally heals 10 damage.
Maintain: Swift: The healing opportunity remains.

Name: Decree of Silence
Flavor: Your presence demands silence.
Trigger: You are the target of a Near or Far attack.
Effect: Creatures in the area of this power cannot be targeted by the attack.

Name: Lifeburst Imbuement
Flavor: This maneuver imbues another to carry out your will.
Effect: The next attack the ally makes has combat advantage, and does 3d8 additional radiant damage on a hit.

Name: Sunstroke
Flavor: Your akasha shapes an attack into a powerful solar flare.
Hit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant and fire damage and persistent fire damage 10 (save ends).
Effect: One ally in the burst can spend a recovery to heal their recovery value.

Name: Shatter Spell
Flavor: A maneuver whose origins did not come from the disciples of the Radiant Dawn, but was quickly adopted and adapted to deal with spellcasters on the battlefield.
Effect: The power comes to an end.

Name: Sunlight Shields
Flavor: his stance sits halfway between martial form and magic prowess, conjuring shields of light to defend yourself and others.
Effect: Allies in or adjacent to the wall get a +2 power bonus to AC. An enemy that moves into the wall stops moving immediately and cannot move for the rest of the turn. Walls created last until the end of your next turn.
Maintain: Swift: Conjure a new wall within range. This does not prolong the duration of existing walls you conjured with this power, which disappear at the end of your turn.

Name: Divide and Conquer
Flavor: This strike pulls essence from the target, creating an effigy of the creature.
Hit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and conjure an effigy of the target in an unoccupied square in range. Any attack that targets the effigy targets the target as well, even if the target would normally be out of range of the attack. The target only gets targeted once by any given attack, even if both the target and their effigy are in the area of effect.

Name: Noblesse Oblige
Flavor: When all else fails, your allies turn to you to save them.
Trigger: An enemy reduces your ally to 0 HP or below with an attack.
Hit: 3dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Effect: The triggering ally can spend a recovery and heal 1 damage, plus they heal equal to the damage done by your attack (if any).
Special: Before the attack, you can shift up to your Strength modifier squares.

Name: Battle Against the Sun
Flavor: To challenge you is to challenge the sun itself: An exercise in futility.
Effect:
You conjure a miniature sun, which occupies one square. The sun casts bright light in a 2-square radius. It makes a ranged attack during each of your turns, including the turn it was conjured. If you spend a move action, the sun moves up to 4 squares. 

*Attack:* Ranged 5, one enemy; your Wisdom vs Reflex; 2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Maintain: Swift: The sun remains another round and makes another attack.

Name: Decree of Freedom
Flavor: With a gesture and a single word, you cause a target’s essence to flare, freeing them from their bonds.
Effect: The target ignores all conditions and persistent damage it is affected by until the end of your next turn. It can also ignore any zones or difficult or hazardous terrain during the same period.

Name: Karmic Strike
Flavor: This blow marks an enemy with a simple brand that burrows into their essence. As they do harm, the brand sees to it that they are harmed as well.
Hit: 3dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, any ally of yours targeted by the target's attack can spend a recovery to heal up to their recovery value.
Maintain: Swift: Maintain the effect.

Name: King’s Castle
Flavor: Your faithful respond to your call for help.
Trigger: An enemy within range hits your ally with an attack.
Hit: 4d10 + Wisdom radiant damage.
Effect: You or a willing ally within range teleports to the triggering ally's space, and the triggering ally teleports to the space you/the other ally just left. The one teleported to the space takes the hit instead of the triggering ally.

Name: Awaken the Sleeper
Flavor: It’s said that the soul of a mortal contains power that can rival the gods, and this maneuver awakens a fraction of that power for a brief moment.
Effect:
Select one of your unexpended encounter or daily powers that takes a standard, move, swift or free action. Your ally can use that power.

They also gain temporary HP equal to your recovery value.

Name: Path of the Sun
Flavor: Coalesce the power of the sun into a powerful beam that washes over enemies and allies alike, leaving behind thousands of motes of light.
Range Details: wall 10, all enemies in the wall
Hit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant and fire damage.
Effect:
Allies that move through the wall only spend 1 movement for every 2 wall spaces moved through. 

Make the attack against any enemy that enters a wall space or ends its turn on a wall space.
Maintain: Swift: Wall remains for another round.

Name: Push the Advantage
Flavor: With the enemy defeated, you spur an ally towards further glory.
Trigger: An ally reduces an enemy to 0 HP or below
Effect: The triggering ally can immediately take a move action and a standard action, in either order. Also, if you spend a recovery all allies within range heal equal to your recovery value.

Name: Harsh Light of Day
Flavor: This attack brings with it a blast of light, forcing enemies to reveal their true selves.
Hit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage and the target is dazed (save ends).
Special: Attack ignores all penalties from cover, concealment, invisibility, etc. If you target a square, the attack is made against the nearest enemy to that square, whether or not you are able to target them or even know that they exist.

Name: Decree of Vengeance
Flavor: You and your allies rise in revenge against your assailants.
Effect: Each ally in range may make a basic attack. If they do so, they heal equal to their recovery value.

Name: Tyrant's End
Flavor: This powerful blow brings the end to tyrant’s reigns.
Hit: 6dW + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Effect: The creature loses all resistances and immunities until the end of your next turn.

Name: Judgement Day
Hit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage and they are blinded (save ends).
Effect: Allies within the area heal equal to their recovery value.

Name: Neural Spear
Flavor: You inflict one bitch of an ice-cream headache.
Hit: 1d4 + Wisdom Modifier damage. At 21st level, increase damage to 2d4 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Name: Puppetmaster
Flavor: You start pulling strings, and the target begins to act according to your wishes.
Hit: The target is dazed until the start of your next turn.

Name: Instant Friends
Flavor: Don't you remember me? We're old palls; you think I could get a ride?
Range Details: burst 1, all creatures that have not attacked you since your last long rest
Hit: The target treats you as a friend and cannot attack you (save ends). You can use your Bluff skill to convince the target to do something for you, as per normal rules for Bluff.
Maintain: Swift: Repeat the attack against the same target. On a hit the target fails its next save against this effect.

Name: Indirect Camouflage
Flavor: Holograms are for wimps; the real trick is to work past the eye and hit the source.
Hit: You disguise your appearance, making you look like someone else in the target’s eyes. The details of your appearance are up to you. You gain a +5 bonus to Bluff checks against the target. Once you create the illusion, you cannot alter it without ending it.
Maintain: Move: The effect persists. You can sustain until the end of the encounter or five minutes.

Name: Recall Probe
Flavor: You sift through the target's memories, searching for the needed one. The target may not wish you to. That's OK; you don't need their permission.
Hit: You search the target’s memories for a specific one. Make an Arcana check: DC 15 for a memory 24 hours old or less, DC 20 for a week old and DC 25 for up to a month old (GM’s discretion for older memories). If the target resists, increase the DC by 5 (the target may also make an opposed Arcana check if they wish): in this case, the target suffers 2d4 + Wisdom modifier damage and is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Miss: The power is not expended, but you cannot use it on the same target for five minutes.
Maintain: Standard: Search for another memory, or repeat a failed Arcana check (inflicting damage if the target resists again). The power ends if you fail two Arcana checks.

Name: Dreamtrancer
Flavor: You move through the netherscape of untapped subconscious to communicate with someone else.
Range Details: one unconscious creature you have met
Effect: You enter the target's dream until the start of your next turn. You can communicate with the target, convince it you are real or not. Once on your turn, make a Wisdom vs. Will attack if you wish to take control of the dream: otherwise, you can only control your dream body and anything you can directly affect with it. If you take control of the dream, the target can attempt a Wisdom or Charisma vs. Will attack at the start of its next turn to regain control. If you inflict harm on the target or the target inflicts harm on itself, it wakes up: however, if you are in control of the dream, the target can only harm itself if you wish it. While you are in the dream, you can take no actions outside of it. If you suffer damage in reality, the effect ends.
Maintain: Free: The effect persists. You can sustain indefinitely until the target wakes up.

Name: Imprint
Flavor: You wave your hand and suddenly a piece of paper looks like a hundred dollar bill, a copper coin looks like a gold coin, or a rock looks like a diamond. Surely there are other applications, but you can't think of any.
Effect: You make one object look like something else of the same approximate size and shape. The illusion only affects the object’s visual qualities. Observers can make a Perception check opposed by your Bluff check to identify the illusion. The effect lasts until you dismiss it as a free action, or until you stop touching the object.

Name: Long Range Communication
Flavor: You concentrate and transmit a simple message over a vast distance.
Range Details: burst 1 mile, one creature you can envision
Effect: You transmit a message of 25 words or less that only the target will hear.

Name: All a Jumble
Flavor: The target mixes up his target and ends attacking his best friend. That won't go over well.
Trigger: A creature makes a ranged attack against you or an adjacent ally.
Hit: The target attacks a different creature of your choice within its attack’s range.

Name: Cut the Strings
Flavor: The target's eyes roll back and he takes a nice long nap.
Hit: The target falls unconscious until the end of your next turn. If it suffers any damage, it immediately wakes up.
Maintain: Swift: Repeat the attack against the same target.

Name: Reverberation
Flavor: You create a sound everyone thinks they hear.
Hit: The target is distracted and grants combat ad-vantage to all creatures until the end of your next turn.

Name: Direct Manipulation
Flavor: You push the target's brain aside and take direct control of the target.
Hit: The target is dominated (save ends).
Maintain: Swift: Repeat the attack against the same target. On a hit, the target fails its next save against this effect.

Name: Making Matters Worse
Flavor: You're already wiggling around their mind. Might as well cut a few nerves.
Range Details: one creature which has taken damage from an arcane power you used
Effect:
The target takes an additional 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage and is weakened until the end of your next turn.

*Level 15:* 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
*Level 25:* 4d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Name: Deep Scan
Flavor: You attempt to scan the thoughts of someone you cannot see.
Range Details: burst 1 mile, one creature you can envision
Hit: You are able to scan the surface thoughts of the target, revealing its current location and what it is doing.
Miss: The power is not expended but you cannot use it against the same target for one hour.
Special: No attack necessary against a willing target.

Name: Instill Confidence
Flavor: You make someone feel just awesome.
Effect: The target gains a +5 bonus to all skill checks until the end of the encounter or five minutes.

Name: Psychic Refresh
Flavor: You are not like other people, limited in their uses of things. What do they think this is, some kind of role playing game?
Effect: Recover the use of one of your encounter powers.

Name: Visual Deletion
Flavor: Although you can still make a noise, your opponents have no other ways to locate you.
Hit: You are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.
Maintain: Move: Repeat the attack.

Name: Act Casual
Flavor: No one suspects a thing.
Hit: The target is dominated (save ends), but not dazed (enabling you to use more than one of its actions) and the doesn't grant combat advantage unless you wish to.
Miss: The power is not expended but you cannot use it on the same target for five minutes.

Name: Neural Slice
Flavor: You send out a cascade of psychic energy to affect all those around.
Hit: The target is dazed, immobile, and weakened (save ends all).
Miss: The target is dazed, immobile, and weakened until the start of your next turn.

Name: Telepathic Blocker
Flavor: You go on the defense to ensure you don’t suffer from any effects you yourself are known for.
Effect: You gain a +4 bonus to Will defense until the end of the encounter or 5 minutes.

Name: Blackout
Flavor: You cut off every sense in your opponent. You suppose they could still smell you.
Hit: The target is blinded and deafened (save ends).
Miss: The target is blinded and deafened until the start of your next turn.

Name: Transplant Senses
Flavor: You can either look through someone else's eyes or force their vision through your own.
Hit: Until the start of your next turn, you either look through the targets eyes or you force the target to see what you see. While looking through the target’s eyes, the target is unaware and you grant combat advantage to all creatures: while looking through yours, the target grants combat advantage to all creatures. If the target takes damage, the effect ends.
Maintain: Swift: The effect persists. You can sustain until the end of the encounter or five minutes.

Name: Field Control
Flavor: This feels more like a tabletop wargame and these are your troops.
Hit: The target is dominated (save ends).
Maintain: Standard: Repeat the attack against the same target. On a hit, the target fails its next save against this effect.

Name: Phrenic Cascade
Flavor: You simply cause havoc in the target's brain.
Hit:
5d10 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
*Level 27:* 7d10 + Wisdom modifier damage

Name: Godly String
Flavor: No matter where they go, no matter where they hide, you can get at them.
Range Details: burst 1 mile, one creature you can envision
Hit: The target is dominated (save ends).
Maintain: Move: Repeat the attack against the same target. On a hit, the target fails its next save against this effect.

Name: Pure Puppeteer
Flavor: You convince the target that what you wish is all that matters. You are nothing less than a god and they will do anything and everything in your name.
Hit: The target is under your control until the end of your next turn. This is identical to being dominated, except you can activate rechargeable, encounter, and daily powers. You can command the target to attack allies or itself (if possible).
Maintain: Move: Repeat the attack against the same target. You can sustain until the end of the encounter, after which you only need to sustain once every hour.

Name: Personality Manipulation
Flavor: Until now, everything you have done has been temporary. People would wake up and feel the fool. Now, there is nothing holding you back…this is that moment where you need to decide which side you’re really on.
Hit: You rewrite the target’s personality so that it is convinced you and your allies are its allies until the end of your next turn. You have no direct control over the target but are able to give it instructions which it will try to follow to the best of its abilities.
Maintain: Move: Repeat the attack against the same target. If you manage to sustain this power until the end of the encounter, the effect is permanent.

Name: Make Room
Flavor: There are others in a better position.  You give them the opening they need.
Effect: The target makes a basic attack against an enemy of your choice, and gains a bonus to damage rolls for the attack equal to your Charisma modifier.
Special: *Level 21:* Use as a move action.

Name: Sound Advice
Flavor: Do that again and try not to suck so much this time.
Trigger: One ally in range misses on a basic attack.
Effect: The target rerolls the attack, retaining all original attack bonuses.

Name: Quick Save
Flavor: A quick word or push allows an ally a momentary improvement to his accuracy.
Trigger: One ally misses with an attack roll against a creature you can see.
Effect: The target repeats the attack roll until they hit or runs out of ammunition.

Name: Geometric Strategy
Flavor: There's a whole machine that works because everyone does what they are supposed to.
Trigger: One ally hits with an attack.
Effect: The target’s attack deals +1dW damage.

Name: No One Hits The Chief
Flavor: You’re hit and your comrades don’t take kindly to that.
Effect: The target makes a basic attack against one creature that hit you since the start of your last turn.

Name: Hold Fast
Flavor: You push the heads down of those around you, keeping them from the line of fire.
Range Details: burst 1, two allies or you and one ally
Effect: The target gains a power bonus to hardness equal to you Charisma modifier until the start of your next turn.
Maintain: Move:  The effect persists until the start of your next turn.  If either target leaves its current square, the effect ends.

Name: Inspire the Troops
Flavor: Come on, say a few words …
Effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to all attack rolls until the start of your next turn. The target gains an additional move action on his next turn, and can trade two move actions for one standard action.

Name: Leave No Man Behind
Flavor: You grab an ally by the shoulder and drag him to safety.
Effect: Spend a recovery, but do not regain hit points; instead, the target regains hit points as if they had spent a recovery. You and the target shift a number of squares equal to 1+ your Charisma modifier. You and the target must be adjacent at the end of the shift.
Maintain: Move: You and the target shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma or Intelligence modifier squares. You and the target must be in adjacent squares at the end of the shift.

Name: When A Plan Comes Together
Flavor: You congratulate the group for a job well done.
Requirement: An encounter ends with no allies dying, unconscious, or bloodied.
Effect: Each ally gains one additional action point.  The encounter gains a +5% experience bonus.

Name: Line of Resolution
Flavor: You and an ally mark a line and refuse to let any opponents past.
Effect: The endpoint of the wall must be adjacent to one ally, and must cover the shortest path between you. You or the ally can make a basic attack as an opportunity action against any creature that enters the wall until the start of your next turn. A creature hit by this attack is immobile until the start of your next turn.
Maintain: Move: The effect persists: if you or the ally has moved, you can also move the wall. This effect ends if the distance between you and the ally is greater than 10 squares or if line of sight is broken with the ally.

Name: Bolster the Line
Flavor: You shout a few inspiring words and quote the soldier’s creed.  The spines of those around you stiffen.
Effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to twice your Charisma modifier.

Name: Control The Battle Theatre
Flavor: You bark out orders and change the pattern of attack.
Effect: The target shifts its speed.

Name: Now What Did We Learn?
Flavor: You talk it over with the others and you show how, even in the direst circumstances, something can be learned.
Requirement: An encounter ends.  At least two allies were staggered at some point during the encounter.
Effect: Each ally regains 2 recoveries and 1 daily power.
Special: This power can only be recovered during a long rest.

Name: Lead the Group
Flavor: You stand in front as a proud example.  Where you point, others will follow.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, on the target’s turn, you can either shunt the target one square or the target gains a +2 bonus to all attack rolls until the end of the turn. You can also use an immediate reaction to grant the target a basic attack.

Name: Corral the Group
Flavor: Your presence inspires others to act with a similar strength of personality.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target gains a +2 bonus to Fortitude and Will defense, a +4 bonus to all defenses against fear attacks, and a +2 bonus to all saving throws. The target also receives temporary hit points equal to twice your Charisma modifier.

Name: Look Alive!
Flavor: You grab an ally by the shoulder, help her up, and reassure her of the triviality of her wound.
Requirement: The target can spend a recovery and heal their recovery value. If the target is prone, they can stand up.

Name: Maintain Formation
Flavor: A team stays together.
Range Details: earshot, three allies more than 3 squares away
Effect: The target shifts its speed -2.  Each target must end the shift closer or adjacent to an ally.

Name: Critical Moment
Flavor: One word of encouragement at the right moments can make all the difference.
Trigger: An ally hits with an attack
Effect: The triggering hit becomes a critical hit.

Name: Face Slap
Flavor: Sometimes a stricken comrade only needs a good smack to wake up.
Effect: The target is no longer unconscious and can spend a recovery. If the target was unconscious from being reduced to fewer than 0 hit points, she regains 1 hit point if they do not spend a recovery.

Name: Pull It Together
Flavor: You resort to anger, encouraging support, or violence to get an ally to shrug it off.
Range Details: touch, one ally suffering from any of the following conditions: blinded, dazed, deafened, slowed, stunned, or weakened.
Effect: You suppress one of the listed conditions until the start of your next turn.
Maintain: Swift: The effect persists.  The target must still be in range.

Name: Just Stop …
Flavor: We need to take a moment to focus…just focus.  Take a deep breath and let us deal with this threat like the team we are.
Effect: The target recovers one expended encounter power and gains one action point which must be used before the end of the encounter. Additionally, until the end of the target’s next turn, he can spend any number of recoveries as a free action.

Name: Encouraging Reaction
Flavor: You risk everything, even personal injury, towards the success of the mission.
Effect: The target can spend a recovery. They can either regain hit points or gain their recovery value as a power bonus to the damage roll on his next hit. The target can make a basic attack.

Name: Boost Performance
Flavor: You offer your expertise to others.  Your talents are appreciated.
Effect: The target gains a 2dW damage bonus to her next hit.

Name: Battle Symphony
Flavor: Allies target where you want. You perform a magnum opus of combat--your concert of sharp gunfire, thunderous explosions, and the silence of your fallen foes.
Effect: The target can shift a number of squares equal to 1+ your Charisma modifier. The target can make a basic attack before or after the move, dealing +2dW extra damage on a hit. If the target misses, he can make a second basic attack, dealing +1dW extra damage on a hit.

Name: Splintering Shot
Flavor: The arrow shatters, damaging targets around.
Trigger: You reduce a creature to 0 HP or below.
Effect: Each creature in a burst 2 around the target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Name: Echo Location
Flavor: Your enemy is certain of your location. They're wrong.
Effect: Select a square in range that you can see that grants granting superior cover or total concealment.  Teleport to that square.

Name: Perfect Shot Placement
Flavor: Thanks to your skill with your weapon, you’re able to make multiple shots without a significant drop in accuracy.
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage.

Name: Torque Twist
Flavor: You wind the cord and draw it tight employing a technique few others know.
Trigger: You hit a creature with a garrote.
Effect: The target takes 1dW extra damage from the triggering attack, and is stunned until the start of your next turn.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).

Name: Compliant Target
Flavor: Your opponent doesn't appear capable of struggling when you have a cord wrapped tight around their neck.
Requirement: You are grappling a creature using a garrote.
Effect: Shift your speed and pull the creature you are grappling with you.  You gain a +2 bonus to sustain the grapple until the grapple ends.

Name: Defenseless Target
Flavor: You feel the breath leave the target as you apply pressure.
Range Details: weapon, one creature you are grappling with a garotte
Effect: The target is helpless against your attacks until the start of your next turn or until you score a hit (whichever comes first). On a hit, the target falls unconscious. If the target suffers any further damage, it is no longer unconscious.

Name: Side Control
Flavor: You gain the edge and lock your opponent on the ground.
Range Details: touch, one creature you are grappling
Effect: Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until they escape.

Name: Tolerance Threshold
Flavor: The enemy puts on the pressure. You grit your teeth and hold back the pain.
Effect: Recover from any of the following conditions at the start of your turn: dazed, slowed, stunned, and weakened. You also end any persistent damage conditions you currently suffer from, and gain a +5 bonus to escape from any grapple you are currently in until you succeed.

Name: Mounted Attack
Flavor: You have complete control. Your enemy is done for the day.
Range Details: touch, one creature you are grappling
Effect: Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Maintain: Move: Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage and the target suffers a -3 penalty to their saving throw against the stunned effect. If the target saves, you can still sustain this power to do damage until the target escapes.

Name: Thought Process
Flavor: You predict where the enemy will move.
Hit: The target suffers a -2 penalty to all attack rolls and grants combat advantage to all allies in open range until the end of your next turn.
Special: You can use this power again with an action point (replacing the action).

Name: Mental Prediction
Flavor: Your knowledge of the enemy runs deep, beyond what your allies or even enemies know.
Range Details: earshot, you and up to four allies
Effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex defense against your focus until the start of your next turn.
Maintain: The effect persists.  You can sustain only once.

Name: This One Especially
Flavor: Of all the targets, this is the one that must be taken down immediately.
Range Details: earshot, you and up to four allies
Effect: The target makes a basic attack against your focus.

Name: Eyes All Around
Flavor: You relay enemy weaknesses to your allies, giving them opportunities to attack.
Effect: The target makes a basic attack.

Name: Reevaluate Strategy
Flavor: Battles are unpredictable and you make a quick alteration in the plan to adjust to enemy maneuvers.
Effect: The target shifts 1 square.

Name: Superior Strategic Endeavor
Flavor: You shout out a particularly complicated plan which will work flawlessly if everyone does what they’re supposed to do.
Effect: The target uses one encounter power.  The chosen power is not expended.

Name: Race to the Fallen
Flavor: An ally falls from a heavy blow. You race to their aid, attacking the enemy desperately in hopes it will back off.
Trigger: One ally in burst you can see is staggered by an attack.
Effect: The triggering enemy is pushed 2 squares, and you make a basic attack against it (in either order).  Shift into a square adjacent to the target. The target can spend a recovery and regain its recovery value plus 3d6 additional hit points.

Name: Impromptu Surgery
Flavor: A foreign implement is causing internal bleeding.  You fish it out and try to close the wound.
Effect: The target automatically succeeds on one saving throw and can spend up to two recoveries to heal its recovery value that many times.

Name: No Longer Civilized
Flavor: An ally succumbs to their injuries.  You can no longer be a healer.  You must be a protector.
Range Details: weapon, one creature that has reduced an ally in line of sight to 0 hit points or below.
Hit: Wisdom
Effect: 4dW + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is pushed a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Special: Repeat the attack against the same target. The second attack suffers a -2 to the attack roll but deals +1dW damage on a hit. If you still miss, the target takes half damage and is pushed one square.

Name: Volume and Presence
Flavor: Your opponent’s argument is invalid and ridiculous and your tolerance for their ignorance is over.
Hit: The target is immobile and dazed until the start of your next turn. You gain a +2 power bonus to Intimidate and Diplomacy checks against the target until the end of your next turn.
Maintain: Swift: You gain a +2 power bonus to Intimidate and Diplomacy checks against the target until the end of your next turn.

Name: Making It Up
Flavor: Unable to find the right set of truths to make your point, you just take a guess.
Effect: You treat your next Bluff, History or Streetsmarts check before the end of your next turn as if you had rolled a 20.

Name: Everything You Got
Flavor: Your arguments are so compelling, your opponent is having a difficult time concentrating.
Hit: The target is stunned until the start of your next turn. The target suffers a -4 penalty against any opposed Diplomacy or Intimidate checks and suffers a -4 penalty to Will defense until the end of the encounter.

Name: Make Sure They're Dead
Flavor: Otherwise you don’t get paid …
Trigger: You stagger a creature with a one-handed weapon.
Hit: 2dW + Strength or Dexterity (your choice) modifier damage.

Name: The Professional
Flavor: No emotions.  No investments.  No hesitation.
Effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you are granted a basic attack outside of your turn (from an opportunity action, ally power, etc), you can make two basic attacks. You must use a one-handed weapon for these attacks.

Name: Like a Ghost
Flavor: You strike.  Your enemy is sure of your position, but they assume wrong.
Range Details: weapon, one creature granting you combat advantage
Hit: 4dW + Strength or Dexterity (your choice) modifier damage.
Effect: Shift up to 10 squares.

Name: Technical Attack
Flavor: Your attack carries amazing power from a short distance.
Trigger: You hit a creature with a melee weapon.
Effect: Until the end of your next turn, each time you hit the triggering creature with a melee attack, you push it 2 squares and knock it prone. If the creature cannot be pushed 2 squares, it takes additional damage equal to twice your Dexterity modifier and is dazed until the start of your next turn. If the target is pushed, you can immediately shift into an adjacent square.
Maintain: Swift: The effect persists against the same target. You can maintain until it is dazed.

Name: Battlefield Dance
Flavor: You flip, jump, and dance your way past your enemies.
Range Details: burst 10, one creature you can see
Effect: Teleport to an adjacent square to the target.  You cannot move though an impassable object (like a wall or locked door).

Name: Pressure Point
Flavor: Your strike causes the touch of death.
Trigger: You hit a creature.
Effect: The triggering creature takes persistent 20 damage (save ends).

Name: Strafing Attack
Flavor: You bolt across the battlefield, hardly taking a moment to aim. The crossbow remains steady as you run.
Hit: 2dW + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is pushed a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Miss: Half damage, and the target is pushed 1 square.
Effect: Before your attack, shift your speed. You can attack at any point during the move.

Name: Through the Hat
Flavor: That last shot had you for certain.  You pass your fingers nonchalantly through your hair and reenter the fight.
Trigger: You are hit with a ranged attack.
Effect: The attack misses.

Name: Bolt Waltz
Flavor: Like a ballet, you sashay and sidestep, firing at opponents and avoiding every counterattack.
Hit: 1dW + Dexterity modifier damage.
Effect: Repeat the attack three times, shifting 4 squares before each attack.

Name: Pioneer
Flavor: You're not tired. You're just getting warmed up.
Effect: Spend any number of recoveries to recover that many times your recovery value, and recover all your used encounter powers. You can spend any number of action points until the end of the encounter.
Special: Once you use this power, you cannot recover it except by taking a long rest.

Name: Reputation Earned
Flavor: Your enemy will soon discover why your name is so feared.
Effect: You can take an additional standard action and an additional move action on this turn and on your next turn.

Name: Not Tolerate Losing
Flavor: You make every ally in the battle know how you feel about defeat. You make them fear you more than the enemy.
Effect: The target regains one expended power. The target also gains an action point he must use before the end of his next turn.

Name: For the Sake of the Team
Flavor: You give an ally the precious time they need complete the task.
Effect: The target can take one standard action, one move action, and one swift action before the end of your turn.

Name: Lasting Image
